text: My daughter is now eschewing antiperspirants with aluminum. She shaves her armpits every day. We were seeking a deodorant that works well. Tom's of Maine did not make muster. This EO Organic citris spray allows you to sweat without the associated smell. I don't know how it works but my daughter has been using it and loves it.

This is a sparkling fruit beverage and it tasted great - too great for unsweetened, flavored mineral water. One look on the back of the can told me why. It has plenty of sugar in it - as much as a regular soda. No wonder it tasted so good!We use a splash of this in our grapefruit flavored unsweetened seltzer water & enjoy the delicious flavor with only a little bit of sugar. One good thing about this brand is that it contains real citrus juice and real sugar. It makes an excellent mixer with vodka or white wine too.

Sturdy cowhide leather belt designed for bigger waists. I've worked with leather in the past and used belt blanks from Tandy leather stores going back to the 1970s, so this belt is much more "floppy" than the thick & stiff leather belt blanks of old & slightly thinner than a Carhartt leather work belt. It is made in India.I like the leather sleeve on the outer part of the belt buckle. It will prevent the belt from wearing as much when cinching it for tightness (big men need to do this so pants will stay up). The belt buckle is attached by folded-over-and-sewn leather (no snaps) so it will not suddenly break away. I ordered one size larger than jeans and it fits well. Leather will stretch when pressure or moisture (water,sweat) is applied to it, so you will need a hole punch to put extra holes in it as it stretches. It is best to alternate belts and give each a "rest" for a week so they dry out and shrink somewhat. Good price for a leather belt.This is the 2nd belt we've purchased from Timberland. It lasts and lasts but the belt loop came off after two years. We could have stitched it back if I still had my leather crafting toolkit with the special thread & needles, but I don't so we just ordered a new belt. I think any shoe repair place could also have fixed the loop.
Sweet, feminine dress that is flattering. It did not cost much, so I didn't expect it to look as nice as it does. My 25-yr old daughter loves it. Recommended for the price!

Purchased from another online vendor, same exact item. The metal bottom is not weighted, so it is not stable enough to hold the weight in the seat. The higher up you need your seat bottom to be, the less stable these stools become. I tried them out on low pile carpet and also on hard kitchen floors - same result.The faux leather looks nice and is cushioned but screws hold the seat to the metal base and you install the screws. They are not very long or thick screws, which translates into less secure seating. The stools do not easily swivel despite the claim.The metal is thin for the shaft and so is the ring where people are supposed to rest their feet.Overall, I would not purchase these bar stools again or recommend them since I think that they are hazardous and not engineered to withstand the weight of adults over 150 lbs, despite the fact that the weight limit stated in the brochure is 150kg.= 330.693!!  It feels as though the bar stool will tip over any second, that moving around in it creaks and sounds like it will break away, and it is too low for my kitchen countertop/bar if I use the lowest setting. I do not recommend. Save your money and use it toward commercial well-made more heavy duty stools of this design or bar stools with four legs.

This product review is for Jarrow-Zymes for Gluten Digestion. Directions are 1-3 capsules (1 capsule=170mg) before each meal containing gluten. Each capsule is capable of digesting 20 grams of gluten.I had a bad reaction to this product after eating an evening meal that had a 4x4” piece of gluten flour product. I felt as if my stomach was going to explode. I can normally eat & digest gluten without issues. I could not sleep well all night, the pain awakened me repeatedly and the discomfort lasted into the next day and finally subsided in the afternoon. I won’t be trying this product again. I do take a daily probiotic in the morning - either Dr. Ohhira or Enzymatic Therapy Acidophilus Pearls, however.I think my gut is very reactive to fungus and I read that this product contains fungal-derived enzymes. Ten years ago, I was unable to tolerate Florastor probiotic (contains a yeast-based cells) and experienced a similar reaction. Although Florastor contains some lactose, when I consume dairy products, I do not experience this almost-bursting,  painful feeling.

Very flattering dress, true to size, priced right. My 5' 5" daughter wears this dress with dark tights, so it is slightly short for more modest wearers. The pattern is attractive and at age 25, it is not too young a style for her.

Not of the quality of many designer dresses, but for the price it is worth it (<$12). The dress is flattering and true to size. For my 5' 5" daughter is was a tad short but paired with like-colored pantyhose for a casual outdoor wedding ceremony, it worked out well. Recommended as priced.

The book, Unfinished Business, is the expansion of an article written by Anne-Marie Slaughter in The Atlantic magazine - “Why Women Still Can’t Have It All.” It is no wonder so many people clamored to read it since its title is almost as socially provocative as the 2000 article in The Sciences journal - “Why Men Rape.” Post publication, there was some negative feedback from working mothers - outliers to the article’s privileged career microcosm - complaining that Slaughter was “perpetuating ‘plutocrat’ feminism” (p. xxi). The outliers were correct.Slaughter’s book discusses the insidious bias & challenges encountered by working caregivers (e.g., Moms/Dads) & she challenges everyone to rethink workplace policies & social orientation to working caregivers, examine caregiving & career expectations in relationships, & reevaluate national attitudes toward the value attributed to caregiving. While these issues have plagued working caregivers for too long, they are hardly new. Including them in a book adds to the squeaky wheel phenomenon however, which may foster the remedying oil of new legislation.This book was a slow, arduous read - the author’s ad nauseam self-aggrandizing distracted from the meat of the matter. Slaughter affirms her inflated concept of self when summing up the outliers’ accusations toward her as “having high-class problems of powerful women like myself.” One of these high-class problems cited in the book was relegating hairdresser appointments & errand shopping to weekends while working for the government in D.C. - a trend most working caregivers take in stride as inevitable.Young [wo]men pursuing careers today will be unable to emulate Slaughter’s career/parental home life success since most will likely witness the abolition of tenure in academia & never realize the numerous perks enjoyed by Slaughter & Co. Slaughter even admits on the first page of Chapter 1 that divulging her path to success may be discouraging to others: “[…]I managed to have a high-powered career [….] was by being a tenured professor at a top university married to another tenured professor[…].”As for Slaughter’s appreciation of the other 98%’s work/caregiving tribulations, she has no notion of what is entailed when new Moms return to work with nursing 6-week old newborns in tow. She abandoned full-time parenting when she began “excellent” daycare for her three-month old babies despite employing a full-time housekeeper, being off-work on paid leave for six months, concurrent with/followed by hubby’s six-month leave, plus both were off for an additional entire semester. While Slaughter may claim that baby bonding & caregiving is of utmost importance & the nation should reorient its mind-set, her own conduct eschewed such convictions when she opted to pay caregivers to watch her three-month old babies & not use the paid time-off given to her. Slaughter has now moved on to running New America. A look at its Facebook page will find many promos for this book.While I balked at the obvious career hubris and sense of entitlement of its author, this book’s message has merit & discusses the pervasive discriminatory issues toward caregivers, which earns it an extra review star. When the D.C. Council recently decided to grant 16 weeks of paid family leave to caregivers of immediate relatives or self, it took a step toward remedying the issues discussed in the book.

Inuyashiki Volume 1 is adult manga published by Kodansha Comics for ages 16 & up.  It is a touching story with impressive artwork.The story details the hurt and difficulties the main character, Ichiro, experiences with ageism. Then, something amazing occurs & Ichiro undergoes a metamorphosis and becomes a new, improved person.The art work is clean, depictive and beautiful. The story is compelling although a big extreme regarding Ichiro’s abuse. The book reads like most manga - read from right to left. The story is easy to follow and the prose good. I would definitely keep reading this series. I appreciate that the manga does not begin with the characters introducing themselves, like most manga stories do. In fact, thought bubbles are infrequently used in manga, but I enjoyed them. The images and context are what convey Ichiro’s emotions & inner thoughts, which is executed effectively as I became immersed in the story.  Recommended!

I was happy to be able to buy this book of old maps that were compiled from actual surveys in 1878. I have seen parts of them online where I could purchase them, but I had no reason to trust these websites.Originally published in 1879, it appears that for some reason the Montgomery County Historical Society was able to gain copyright in 1975 to this Atlas. I am glad to have a high quality paper booklet of these maps that shows where founding families' farms were located for the district where I am living and for Washington, DC where my ancestors lived out their lives.

Bought this for our bathroom. It is the right color and sold for a great price. It was shipped freight and arrived in excellent condition. The finish is acceptable for a bathroom vanity that will most likely be replaced after ten years or so, and while the backside shows the particle board (MDA) wood, it is hidden when installed.

Purchased this to hold All-Clad kitchen utensils. The bottom is weighted sufficiently so that the six, heavy all-metal All-Clad utensils do not make it tip over. Some bamboo utensils & silicone spatulas were added and it still did not tip over. Recommended!

This is an industrial/commercial style wastebasket. The color is not quite pitch black - more of a blackish charcoal. It is on the small side and would be suitable for a restroom or desk area where trash will be minimal or removed on a daily basis.I thought it would be more appealing than its photo but I think the photo makes it appear better than it is.  It was inexpensive and I was going to place it beside a bed side for tissues or odds and ends, but it is too unattractive for that. Right now I use it as a bucket and it is working out well!

I bought this Lipper set of bamboo utensils and was alarmed by the shiny finish. My other bamboo spoons (Pampered Chef) did not have a shiny finish on them when new. It is scary that these utensils are coated with a shiny finish like polyurethane or lacquer. With the numerous & documented food & product safety issues with items made in China, I do not trust the finish to be non toxic, so I am returning these utensils.In the photo if you look at the top of the utensils, you can see the shine from the finish. The label states "Utensilios De Bambu" and "Bambu 100% natural." "Made in China." While bamboo is natural, the finish may not be. The label should disclose which chemicals are used in the finish.

We avoid artificial sweeteners and drink water, almond/coconut milk, and flavored seltzer most of the time. Since we are unused to these sweeteners, we can detect them in everything. After one taste of the SoBe Lifewater, we disliked the flavor. I misunderstood the "no artificial sweetener" blurb to mean that it contained cane sugar. I was planning to use these drinks for an extended family gathering.The ingredients in products are listed in the order of amount and Erythritol* is the 2nd ingredient listed after filtered water. Stevia leaf extract is also among the ingredients and we think it adds to its displeasing taste.• Erythritol is a sugar alcohol that is manufactured commercially by fermenting a sugar-rich substance like glucose with a fungus like yeast. Our bodies do not break it down due to its chemical structure, so it can cause digestive issues but most of Erythritol is absorbed by the small intestine and about 90% is excreted by the kidneys.

These black diamond earrings are white gold and simply elegant. My daughter wanted stud earrings that were not too busy yet still looked classy. These earrings were a good price and have held up well. The only thing we did not realize is that black diamonds do not sparkle at all - the light is absorbed by the black color. It is something we did not consider when purchasing.

I ordered this PJ set and am very pleased with it. I usually do not like 100% synthetic material (pants) for bed wear but I wanted something that I could also wear around the house. These PJs are sized generously and at 5'4.5" tall, the pants are long enough to cover my ankles but do not touch the floor.The top is a little bit too wide in the shoulders so any undergarment like a bra strap will be exposed. I have wide shoulders that are not sloped, so if the top is wide on me, I think it will may be too wide on someone whose is formed with more narrow shoulders. Recommended with caveats.

Big guy jeans that look good and are more flattering than many my husband has tried. It fit as expected and doesn't have extra yardage in the hips as some other relaxed fit brands do. The price was right as well. Recommended!

I needed a higher than usual rolling step stool that would accommodate more than the standard weight. This one was so easy to assemble, just snap the top part into the bottom part! I am so happy with this rolling step stool.We use it in place of the folding ladders that can be cumbersome and awkward to use in tight spaces. I seldom stand on the lower portion I need the added height afforded by the higher top step. It moves into position with ease. Highly recommended!

Thie Intermatic IW600K offers numerous applications like random on/off for lighting variations while away on vacation, dusk-to-dawn settings that auto adjusts to daylight savings, and a rechargeable battery backup.I could not install the Intermatic IW600K where I had intended - motion sensor floodlights that turn on via motion sensor & can be set in three modes via the switch inside - steady on all the time, motion sensor (which comes on every time a car drives down the street, or a deer wanders into its path), or off. So, we opted to install it for the back patio motion sensor floodlight that only has an on/off toggle switch.I love this switch timer since I can set it to turn on only during the hours when it is dark, which will save me power costs during the day when deer wander around my backyard. For a long time, I've had to keep it on the porch floodlight in the off setting; otherwise, it was off & on all night (annoying) and all day as well.We went on you tube and read other reviewers for tips on installing and encountered no issues. I really like this option and highly recommend this switch.

This Imprint Cumulus9 cushioned mat is fantastic and is in front of my dryer where I stand to fold clothes. It feels like memory foam is inside, which cushions your feet. After using two Imprint mats Imprint Comfort Mat, 20 by 36-Inch, Mocha/Taupe in my kitchen for two years, I wanted more for other areas in my home with hard floors. My original Imprint mats show no signs of wear whatsoever and are still holding up. This Cumulus9 mat offers a 7-year warranty.These mats hold up well, will not trip you as they lie flat on the floor & do not curl at the edges, and are so easy to clean since they are waterproof & resistant to staining. Highly recommended!

This wonderful moisturizer comes out of the tube like a typical bead of white moisturizer but once rubbed onto the skin, turns color. It is fun to watch!I have very light skin and the foundations that match are typically ivory or pale in color. What is nice about this tinted moisturizer is that the color sinks into my skin. While it looks like a yellowish tan color as I am first applying it on my face, the color quickly blends well with my natural skin tone. It appears as though it disregards of the hue of my skin and blends in anyway.I also like it as a tinted moisturizer for wearing alone on hot days when foundation seems too heavy. I have also worn it under the mousse foundation I usually wear, which is dry & not oily, and it works well underneath that product as well. I don't need tone adjustments for my skin, so I cannot address this particular benefit of the product. Highly recommended.

These are a fabric-feeling suede exterior and a soft leather lining and sole. The sole is completely smooth and very slippery on carpet. These are cute shoes and very comfortable but the sizing is off. I ordered and returned a size 7 kate spade new york Women's Wendy Ballet Flat - fit was perfect but my daughter didn't care for the big ladybug. These Jayla flats are too long and wide in a size 7. They bow out when walking and the heel is well beyond the heel of the foot. We will need to return these. I am reluctant to purchase another Kate Spade flat due to this sizing disparity...

Cellucor NO3 Chrome Solid is a stimulant- & creatine-free pre-workout supplement in capsule form. The NO3 is nitric oxide that acts as a vasodilator which allows greater blood flow (oxygen & nutrients) to muscles/organs. Three capsules contain Vitamin C (83mg-138% RDA), Calcium (83mg-1% RDA) Arginine Nitrate [NO3-T] (1250mg), + Extreme Vascularity Complex (750mg) Nitrosigine Inositol-Stabilized Arginine.**You need to take the capsules on an empty stomach at least 1 - 1.5 hours before working out. My daughter’s 28-yr old boyfriend followed the directions but stated that he felt no changes and his workout was the same after 4-capsule doses on at least four occasions and he took no other workout supplements. However, my son, who has used the powdered version of various Nitric Oxide pre-workout supplements, suggested combining the capsules with a 2nd pre-workout supplement (e.g., Cellucor C4). Yet C4 has caffeine, which is an ingredient that Cellucor NO3 eliminated in its formula. We did not try adding more capsules (dose to six).This formula may appeal to individuals who cannot consume caffeine or stimulants for various reasons. It is nice that such options are available. Many warnings are listed on the bottle such as discontinue two weeks prior to surgery, do not take if on blood thinners, do not take Viagra, antidepressants, any dietary supplement, any over-the-counter or prescription drugs whatsoever, including the catch-all nonspecific do not take if you have “any medical condition.” Hmm.** Nitrosigine is a complex of bonded arginine silicate that increases nitric oxide (NO) and silicon blood levels in the body by bonding NO’s precursors - arginine and silicon. NO relaxes smooth muscle in blood vessels thereby increasing blood flow.

Slow West stars Michael Fassbender as Silas Selleck, a bounty hunter who begins to follow a 16-yr old Scot Jay Cavendish (Kodi Smit-McPhee-The Road) to his destination. Cavendish is in pursuit of a Scot woman he loves, who is wanted & has a bounty of her head. Selleck winds up as a mentor & guide to the youth despite his ulterior motives.I adore Michael Fassbender and watching him in cowboy mode was a treat, but this movie was not for him. I thought the plot was as plodding as the horses in the desert and the entire experience was nothing I care to repeat.

This is a sci-fi movie about AI androids who have feelings but are mistreated by humans. One man, Caleb (Domhnall Gleeson - son of Brendan Gleeson) a talented programmer (coder) is called upon, under false pretenses, to administer the Turing Test (can a human ascertain via conversation/questions if test subject is a machine) to a particular android. The hard-drinking CEO (Nathan - Oscar Issac) of the company Caleb works for, brings Caleb to his isolated mountain retreat to administer his testing of the beautiful and beguiling android, Ava (Alicia Vikander). Secrets and intrigue begin to unfold and viewers are kept wondering who to believe and just how far genius Nathan has crossed the ethical/moral line in creating his masterpiece.There is a Star Trek reference in the movie that I found telling since one of Star Trek's episodes features a beautiful android female created by an immortal who wanted her to have feelings but she was destroyed in the process. I did not think that this movie was original enough or had enough oomph to sufficiently intrigue me. I lost interest halfway through but watched until the end. Worth a watch when nothing else is of interest.

I am very pleased with this Ocean Waves clear glass pitcher with lid. It is sturdy with a handle the extends out from the body of the pitcher sufficiently to allow my ham-fisted paw to grasp it with ease. It comes with a rigid plastic red lid that has a cut-out slot which, when aligned with the spout, allows a modest flow of liquid. The lid remains in place while pouring a full pitcher half filled with ice cubes preventing the ice cubes from tumbling out willy nilly & accidentally splashing liquids onto tablecloths or the laps of recipients holding glasses to be filled.The pitcher holds almost 1/2 gallon but viewing it side-by-side with a 1/2 gallon carton of milk, it appears deceptively smaller. I wish the red lid was designed with a rubber-like seal so refrigerator odors & pesky flies never reach whatever libation it holds, but the slot, however minimal, prevents such a seal.I like its more petite silhouette since, once filled with liquid, it is more manageable than larger pitchers which can be challenging to hold aloft while filling individual glasses around a table or toting on a tray. My hand can fit inside the pitcher for cleaning, which is a plus. Recommended!

I purchased this wheelchair for my mother when she needs to go out to appointments etc. I had a difficult time collapsing it, however.I needed a wheelchair where she could roll herself a little bit if she wanted to. This chair has plastic foot rests and they can be annoying in certain scenarios. If you put them to the side, the wheelchair is too wide for a standard interior doorway. If they are left down and front, you will need plenty of maneuvering room as you go forward. We easily removed them completely, which is a nice feature, but may not be practical for some.I was able to snag this in Amazon's warehouse deals so I paid far less than the current price. This is a decent chair. My experience with wheelchairs dates back to the mid-1980's when my father-in-law was wheelchair bound and later in 2010 with my mother-in-law...
This seat is just right for my tush - it is hard but not like a board. I don't want to sink into memory foam since it interferes with my posture. I use this at my desk in my desk chair. Recommended!

I love these huge glasses that allow for 3 cups of liquid! The colors around the rims are so festive. I used acetone nail polish remover on a paper towel and the tacky residue from the stickers came right off. The glasses are thick, substantial, and show tiny bubble imperfections in the clear glass. They feel smooth to me on the outside & the bottoms are polished so they won't scratch surfaces.I measured with a measuring cup for liquids and was able to pour just under 3 cups (24oz) of water into each glass. If you notice in the photo, the two glasses look to be differing sizes but I was amazed that they held the same amount of water.The line in the photo through the glasses is a reflection of the bottom edge of the white background board and not a defect in the glassware. I placed a 2 liter bottle of soda for size comparison. Recommended!

I was able to get these boots from Amazon warehouse deals. I jumped on them since I mistakenly assumed that they were leather. When they arrived I noticed that they were made in China, smelled strongly of plastic, and were not leather. I reviewed the page and the reason that I thought they were made of leather was due to the color "black leather" which misled me.I bought them for my daughter who does not mind non leather boots. She normally wears a size 7M shoe, and these boots were a 7.5M. With thick socks on, she said they would be OK for walking around. She likes the style of the higher boot shaft.I have been able to find leather boots at Amazon warehouse for very low prices (e.g., leather Creative Recreation boots, $18), so this was one reason why the lower price did not alert me as to the material. Recommended if you don't prefer leather.

I like to store food in glass at home because there are less odors from plastic (lids only) and I can see whether or not the glass has food residue on it. These containers are rather small to store family meal leftovers but still, I have already used them several times. They are handy and I like how the lids snap on them. Recommended!

Wow, sizing is way off. I bought a 3X for a relative and it not only did not fit, it barely fit me. The 3X fits like a 14-16 or even smaller. The design is pretty. The bust has an apron of fabric that covers that area, which may or may not be desirable. The fabric is all polyester, so could be hot outside in summer and may present static cling issues.

The LG G4 phone has a slim, slightly curved profile & came in black leather, which is mounted on a flexible plastic cover, pulled & folded over the edge. One nice feature of this LG G4 phone is the double tap screen feature that toggles the phone on/off. The G4 is equipped with HSPA+ (5.76 Mbps max up, 42 Mbps max down) & LTE Cat. 6 (50 Mbps max up, 300 Mbps max down) for data transfer. The G4 should not present problems for travelers in Europe. The power & volume controls are located in the rear. The Infrared (IR) blaster (allows cell phone to act as a remote control - TVs, DVD players, etc.) & noise cancelling microphone is located at the top edge of the phone (two little holes) while the microUSB port, standard microphone, & 3.5mm headphone jack are at the bottom. The microSD card (capacity up to 2TB), microSIM slots as well as the removable 300mAh battery are under the casing that can be pried off via a small slit on the bottom right side. The Near Field Communications (NFC) chip is also integrated into the back cover. The manufacturer includes a one year warranty from the date of purchase on its product.This GSM/HSPA, LTE , HSAP, HSUPA, EDGE, GPRS, NFC phone supports Wi-Fi 802.11a/b/g/n/ac standards, & Bluetooth 4.0. The rear facing camera has a maximum resolution of 15.9 MP - 5312x2988 pixels (16:9 aspect ratio). It sports a fast F1.8 (wide open) aperture & sensor size of 1/2.6” (<1/2” overall), optical stabilization (IOS2) & laser-assisted autofocus. The purpose of the sensor is to determine whether the ambient light source is artificial or natural, which produces a more realistic image. The front camera has a maximum resolution of 8 MP - 2448x2364 pixels (4:3). The mode for spoken commands can be exploited for photos shot via a selfie stick. Video is a max Ultra-HD (4k, 3840x2160 pixels, 30 fps, 30 Mbps). Sound is recorded in stereo. Slow motion videos can also be recorded with up to 120 fps.The G4 uses an Android 5.1 Lollipop operating system that allows for a second “friend” account. The 2nd friend account is independent & has its own settings and apps. It also offers:64-bit hexa-core 1.8Ghz Qualcomm Snapdragon 808 chip4 ARM Cortex-A532 ARM Cortex-A57 cores3GB of RAMAdreno 418 Graphic Processor Unit (GPU).Integrated X10 LTE radioGPS with Glonass & BeiDou networks to determine positioning5.5” screen - 1440 x 2560 pixel display, 9.8mm thick by 3” wideIPS Quantum displayPotential Drawbacks' Uber & Digital Life platform (for home automation security) - are some native apps. If you don’t plan to use them, then they are just bloatware,  as they cannot be deleted, only disabled, which still uses memory' No preinstalled flashlight widget (Galaxy S5 had this)' Micro-USB port supports only the 2.0 standard' G4 is protected by Gorilla Glass 3, not the newer Gorilla Glass 4' Out-of-the-box Google Chrome is the only browser option' Otterbox Defender I bought at an AT&T store has a sticker stating “not compatible with Leather LG G4” - I need to call Otterbox to see if they make one for the leather G4' I wanted to try out the G4 speakerphone since it is difficult to discern what I am saying on my Galaxy S5 speakerphone while in the car, outside, inside stores, or wherever there is any background noise. Callers have not noticed an improvement with the G4 speakerphone in similar environments' Wi-Fi battery life was less than 6 hours. The battery lasts about a day without charging if using for games, Internet, etc.' Screen dims intermittently while using to avoid overheating issues. This dimming can be very inconvenientPotential buyers who wish to compare LG G4’s features with their current phone can do so at phone arena website.

I use paper towels a lot for cleaning, so I was eager to give these Bounty impregnated with Dawn detergent a try. The paper towels are thicker than regular Bounty and when wet clean as if you had used Dawn, paper towels & water. It is a convenience to have the towels ready to go.The dry paper towels have the scent of Dawn like fabric softener sheets have a scent. I like the scent. Once wet, the dry detergent in the towel becomes more like a foamy-type soap-based cleaner with a wet paper towel. The cleaner lasts a long time and as I was cleaning my countertops, picked up dirt that I did not realize was there. Recommended!.

I purchased two sets for storing and moving. These clear tubs are small enough that loading them to the brim and lifting them is something that can be accomplished by children and people who do not have much strength. Great idea for storing children's toys since the kids will be able to stack or move the filled tubs. I bought one set for my 87-yr-old Mom to pack with office documents while prepping for a move. While she cannot easily lift them when full, I can. I bought the 2nd set for my own displaced desk documents that were cluttering up my kitchen table. I love that you can see what is inside without needing to take off the lid. I love the locking handle grips - such an improvement over the old Sterilite lids that just fit on the tub. I love their smaller size, which makes them handy for stacking and storing. I like their price. Highly recommended.

The Philips Norelco Shaver 7300 is truly gentle on my skin. I am using it to shave unwanted hair everywhere. I notice that it works best on hair that is thicker & bristle-like (stubs) rather than finer hair areas. I compared it to my old triple head electric razor and it did not do the job as well but then I also felt the sting of the older razor. The instructions advise that the shave will become closer after one's body acclimates during a training period.I recommend this razor for people with sensitive skin or those who need to shave over areas where nicks may occur using a manual bladed razor.

I tried to keep track of due dates for reports/projects on my smart phone but I was not as successful as I had intended, so it’s back to the tried and true written planner. This student planner made by Five Star is the perfect size (5.5x8.5”) to fit inside a tote or backpack without taking up a lot of room. The exterior is made of a durable plastic-coated cover. The months run from August, 2015 to July, 2016 with the beginning of each month displaying a small square calendar of the previous & next month in the upper left corner as well as a far-right column and bottom margin area for notes.Inside the planner, each week (Mon-Sun) is displayed at once across a 2 page spread & pages are ruled & organized with day of the week/date headings. There is a thick stock 2015/16 reference calendar on the 1st page with holidays listed for years 2015-2017 on the backside of the calendar as well as on those particular dates throughout the planner. The 1st page is followed with a 2-page spread for one’s class schedule allowing for the name of class or activity, time, location, & days of the week (one can circle). The schedule is followed by a section divided by month for notes entitled, Dates to Remember. There are plastic-coated, sturdy, tabs labeled for each month.In the back there are reference pages including one for URLs with login credentials [OK only if you know others cannot view it], favorites, a conversion table for fractions, decimal, percentage, liquid measurement equivalents, U.S. to metric conversion table, temperatures in Celsius and Fahrenheit, a periodic table of the elements, spelling tips, proofreading symbols, state abbreviations, a map of the U.S. showing all states & capitals + time zone changes, and an equal area projection map of the world. The last page is a plastic pocket insert for storing tickets, or small paper items. I could not find the pen loop on the cover. Highly recommended!

I thought that this hair straightener would be on par with one I have purchased in the past - Farouk developed by Chi. It was not. I had to return it.One problem with this implement is that it is long and heavy. Fine for professional stylists but cumbersome for self-styling. The other problem was that it did not slide through the hair easily; rather, it stumbled down the length of hair with starts and  stops. We could not explain why this occurred on two different types and lengths of hair, so we returned it.

The Rising, by author Ryan D’Agostino, is the consolidation of articles he wrote for Esquire magazine - “A House on the River” (2013) & “The Survivor” (2011) with perhaps additional details. The book recounts the horrific, real-life events that took place when the spouse & two young daughters of endocrinologist William Petit, Jr. were tortured, sexually assaulted, and brutally killed as the family home was set afire in an attempt to hide evidence. A victim who was attacked first by the intruders, Petit was beaten with a bat in the head. Hooded & tied up in the basement, despite losing so much blood (due to blood thinning meds) Petit survived by escaping just as the house began to go up in smoke & flame.Since an author must rely on the candor of his source - William Petit, Jr. - it does not surprise this reader that the complaints and conflicts of most families are absent in this book. The narrative smacks of Petit’s directives so every Petit family member’s virtues are recounted repeatedly and extolled. Disciplined, brilliant, successful, hard-working, moral, compassionate, generous, & devoted to each other sums up each member of the Petit extended family. The only negative observation about anyone is that Petit usually exercises supreme control over his emotions and often presents a flat affect to others, which may be off-putting to some. One needs to look deeply into his eyes to see beyond his stone-faced demeanor.As a reader, I am baffled as to why Petit, initially so averse to media attention of any kind, has orchestrated this book and made very intimate details of each of his family member’s demise public. How can a husband think that his wife or daughters would want him to ever market such details? Since Petit married a women 20 years his junior and subsequently fathered another child, it appears that Petit’s angst so laboriously detailed in the book together with the graphic details of his loved ones' demise is made public for an express purpose only Petit knows.The book underscores a seldom presented aftermath that survivors of violent crime must face when courts prosecute the perpetrators. The waiting is tedious, boring, & seemingly endless. Some of the more trying aspects include (1) the posturing of the representing attorneys as they build their future careers or make mistakes when they should know better, (2) facing the person who raped & sexual violated and then burned alive your loved ones. How Petit managed to get through the trauma is beyond most mortals. Mention is made of the uncomfortable bare-wooden benches in courtrooms which are punishing to older people and where survivors must sit all day. The long commutes to other cities for trials that take such a toll. Lives are on hold and careers halted, as the focus becomes the court trials. Years go by and the suffering survivors are tethered to the crimes & must relive every minute detail in court, day after day, year after year. For Petit, five years go by as he devotes himself to the trial process ensuring that he has done all he could to promote justice for his slain family. Yet after the 4th year of grieving and agony, he manages to fall in love & begin a new life with his new wife & baby son. He is a survivor - hence the title of the book.

Wow, this is exactly the same as what I used to buy from my health insurance provider's CPAP supplier except the provider's equipment cost way more. I lined up the two tubes side by side and could not tell a difference.I am using this tube and was grateful to find it on Amazon since my husband's company gave him a big pay cut & then the next month notified employees that most health insurance premium costs would be shifted onto employees, so a good health insurance plan became unaffordable. Now we have to pay for everything until a high deductible is met ($5,000) & then pay 10% until $10,000 out of pocket is met & we are paying more than twice what we paid for our previous plan last year.  So, affordable CPAP equipment is a blessing.

Hubby loves this - and I borrowed his to complete the Washington Post Magazine find the difference between the two pictures challenge while resting in bed. My bedside table lamp did not have the illumination power I needed. The LE headlamp has a low, medium and high illumination setting that is adjusted through a rubber push-in button. It also has two, single red LED lights that flash. I presume these lights would be handy for people who jog or walk the dog after dark. Excellent combination - well thought out design. I did not encounter the DOA issue with my purchase that other reviewers encountered. I plan on ordering more, so I will see if I get a bad apple.Hubby has used this to work under the sink and any time he would like a bit of extra light to shine on a project. He has short hair and has encountered no problems with the elastic strapping fitting his head. I, however, had the straps slide upward toward the top of my hair but I have long hair that is silky, so this may be why I had the trouble.Overall, it is useful tool and bright enough illumination for almost everything. The price is excellent. Highly recommended.

UPDATE 10/08/15: I have used this every two weeks since receiving it on upper lip, chin, and armpits. I began with the low and medium settings but changed to high five weeks after my 2nd treatment. I am sorry to report that the chin hair shows no discernible improvement (no thinning, no less growth) but my armpit hair seems to have responded a little bit. It's possible that my chin hair contains some white or colorless hairs, but my upper lip does not. I have no explanation as to why the arm pit hair seems to have responded while the facial hair has not...I was excited to try the Tria Hair Removal Laser Precision laser. I am endeavoring to grow more hair on my head but annihilate the roots of hair that sprouts on my face. The bikini area has a reservation for later. The Tria laser unit is designed in the U.S. and assembled in Thailand.I have very light skin and medium brown hair. After activating my device per the triabeauty website, I charged it for at least two hours, as instructed. Each charge lasts about 15-20 minutes. I then used it on a trial spot to ensure that my skin did not have a reaction to the laser. After waiting 48 hours, I used it on my chin, upper lip and underarms.I used it on low for the first treatment on my face but changed to the medium setting for my underarms. I waited two weeks per the instructions, and used it again. I selected the high setting for the face and the medium setting for the underarms.What’s In the Box:Wand-style pink laserWall and USB chargerQuick Start Guide - and sleeve with activation website URLInstructionsI have encountered no skin issues with the Tria laser. It is difficult to tell whether there have been any changes to my hair growth, so it is not significant yet, but I think that my hair growth is not as dense as before treatments.The instruction manual states that studies show up to 70% hair reduction three weeks, after a user’s second treatment. I need to submit my review prior to this time frame of one month (two treatments) + three weeks, so I will need to update my review (and star rating) if I notice significant changes in hair loss.

I'm using this phone right now. I like a not cordless phone for my major calling on my home phone since I was surprised when I picked up my cordless phone to hear my neighbor having a conversation on her wireless phone, and I also heard a neighbor's baby monitor (and whatever conversation was near it) on my wireless phone (years ago). I feel more secure with a wired phone so I know that my neighbors cannot accidentally hear my conversation.This phone caller ID panel lights up orange only when there is an incoming call. It makes the extra large text of the caller ID display stand out so it is easier to read. It has an "in use" bar at the top of the caller ID panel that flashes orange for an incoming call (and the phone also rings if it is set to audible ring). This "in use" bar does not light up when another extension phone is being used, but an LCD message "Line in Use" is displayed on the caller ID panel so someone knows whether an extension phone is off the hook or not to pick up the phone if someone else (or a fax machine) is using it. It has a built-in answering machine (I do not use), a good speakerphone, mute, flash, audio assist, extra large buttons that are easy to see and easy to use caller ID log list.I purchased this phone for my Mom who has macular degeneration and bought a second one for me. It was easy for me to set up. I replaced my previous phone with this one since I could not read the caller ID very well since it was totally LCD and did not display too well in daylight, and the panel for the caller ID did not tilt toward me. This phone's caller ID panel can be flat or tilt upward if you are using it on a table surface. Highly recommended!
I bought these for one of my daughters very wide calves - 18 inches. She tried them on and they fit perfectly. She was happy. Recommended!

I was surprised by this show. I had never watched it before and viewed it in marathon style. My daughter recommended it. Very lovely sandal where sparkles abound! I have trouble with my pair since the top of one of my feet is swollen (don't know the reason) so I can barely get that foot in. I really like Method detergent and use it exclusively in my HE front loading washing machine, but the shorter bottles of Method are still breaking.The part that breaks is the horizontal hard plastic around the external pumping mechanism, so I cannot repair or fix. I was hoping that the shorter stature of these bottles would fix the issue (that required me to find other bottles to pour my liquid Method in). I assumed that the bottles must fall over or onto the floor (which they have in the past too many times and leaked all over everywhere, ugh!) but this time I stored them in a cabinet and loaded up the top of my washer/dryer & folding counter, so nobody could place them there - only back into the cabinet. Somehow, it broke despite my efforts. Boo. I like Method but dislike the bottle dispensers.

I love all natural, organic products & this eye renewal gel doesn't disappoint. It has all natural ingredients & no harmful chemicals. This eye gel is really amazing. Just open the bottom of the tumbler by twisting, take out the infuser, fill with your favorite loose tea, my very favorite is my loose green tea with lemon rinds, lemon grass & bergamot. What I personally love most about this tumbler is that I can now cut back on the time it takes to make my tea when I am leaving my house. I used to have to do the whole making of the loose tea process in another cup & then I would transfer it into a coffee mug. Not anymore!! This tumbler really is great, it can also be used to take coffee along with you, if tea isn't your thing. He has orders to not do it again, as I want this tumbler for my own outings. I will though try & purchase him his own for the holidays. I am very content with this tumbler & I fully recommend. It connected quickly & has great sound clarity & plenty of base. The only reason I gave it four stars is because I wish it would have a tad more volume for parties & large gatherings. Over all great product. I received this @ no cost for providing my honest opinion.

I'm not an expert so I can't tell you why or how this works but the result is it is clearing imperfections in my skin that I have fought for years. I think that this product really does offer good results. My fine lines seem less noticeable, & I love how the product feels going on. I am even able to skip moisturizer. It provides enough moisture for my skin. I love that it is very light. I have trouble picking face creams & lotions. Sometimes they are too heavy for my sensitive skin. This one was not, & the texture was just right. I recommend to any one combatting fine lines & wrinkles. I received this @ no cost for my honest opinion.

I wanted these for my husband since he tends to lose or break every pair I get him. I knew he needed a new pair. He loves the style & the comfort of the nose piece. These glasses are very light & the wrap around the head to block side sun light is perfect.The protective sleeve is quite handy to avoid scratching the lense & also comes with a nice sunglass wipe to get rid of the finger prints & smudges. The fact that these are polarized is just what my husband needs. He uses them when he goes running on weekend mornings, when he bicycles & also when he is quad riding & doesn't need to wear his goggles. My husband would definitely recommend. I received these @ no cost for my honest opinion.

Every winter my husband & son go dirtbike & quad riding every weekend, unless its raining bad or snowing, they don't care about the cold weather. When my husband rides every winter, a  major problem that he runs into, is that his goggles fog up. On days when the weather is really, really cold & wind chills approach, he has to wear a full face mask. When he does, he generates & traps so much body heat, that his goggles would fog up almost instantly! With this Z-spritz, only the very bottom of the lens fog up temporarily. I would say it's a 95% improvement.  I received this @ no cost for providing my honest opinion. The application is very easy. Just clean the goggles front area well, let them dry, soak a cloth (we used a sunglass wiping cloth) &wipe it on. I received this @ no cost for providing my honest opinion.

We had a crack in our front steps that was causing sprickets.... if you don't know what they are, they are a cross between a spider & a cricket to get into my house. I recently had it repaired, but some got into our basement, so I put this pest eliminator down there. Haven't seen once down there since. I have never, ever had ANY bug, besides mb a moth or fly in the upstairs of my house. Apparently, one of those icky sprickets found their way up there. I was half asleep two days ago in my bed & I felt something jump on my arm.....YEP, it was a spricket...its OK, you can laugh...but, I didn't think it was funny while it was happening!! I takes it off my arm & threw it onto my husband LOL LOL!! He didn't move & I caught the darn bug in a cup & threw it outside. I went immediately down stairs & got the pest eliminator & haven't seen another upstairs since. It is simple to understand the directions, read them...don't just plug it in & think it immediately works. I held down the button & a series of lights comes on..red, yellow then green. This can also be used as a night light to illuminate any room. Its lightweight & attractive looking plugged into my wall. I received this @ no cost for providing my honest opinion.

They fit great & have a nice stretch to them. They are made with eco fabric. Nice classic black pants that I can dress up or down. They are slimming as well - made my legs look longer. I am 5'7 with a mediumish build & they fit me as expected. So comfy, if you're thinking of getting these, just go for it, you'll love the look & feel. A must for your wardrobe! I love that they come in a blue stylish flat box with silver lettering. This packaging makes for a perfect gift. I received these @ no cost for providing my honest opinion.

Herb grinders are exceptional tools for culinary use, whereby you can make fantastic spice mixes faster & easier. This grinder gets the job done & is very professionally made to last. I like the weight of it, the simple look of it, & that the teeth are very sharp!! Sharp teeth make for fine, yet fluffy herbs. Also, it comes in a nice carry around & storage cylinder. I would say if you are in the market for a herb grinder, seriously look no further than this company...I have multiple grinders from this company & their grinders are build to last a long time. Epic grinder for many uses, I fully recommend!! I received this @ no cost for providing my honest opinion.

These pajama pants are so much better than I had even expected. These pants come in a blue with silver writing package, that is a great for gifting. These pants are made from the perfect combination of organic cotton, viscose derived from organic bamboo & spandex. These pants also have a drawstring to tie to make either tighter or to loosen if tied. These are a very silky smooth feeling pant. I gave these to my son. He is 6'1 & 130 lbs., we ordered medium & they fit him well. We also ordered the heather gray color & really like it. I have washed & dried these twice, dryer on low, & they are still in good shape without shrinkage. I received these @ no cost for providing my honest opinion.

This spiralizer takes squash or zucchini & makes it into amazingly long strands of spaghetti like looking noodles. What I do, is steam them with a little olive oil, a sprinkle of sea salt & ground pepper & it is a deliciously healthy alternative to spaghetti/carb overload. It works well with soft vegetables like zucchini, summer squash or cucumbers. Harder vegetables like carrots or potatoes dont work well.  Easy to clean with the special brush cleaner that comes with this. Also easy to store when not using in the black drawstring pouch that comes with it as well. All in all, it's fun, easy to use & is the reason my husband & kids eat more vegatables!! I received this @ no cost for providing my honest opinion.

My son loves anything that goes fast or flies. I gave this to him as a gift, to say he was excited would be an understatement!! He wanted to get it up & flying straight away. It took close to 20 minutes to get a full charge. After charging, my husband & son together took out the remote control & began flying the nano. My hubby pretty much got the hang of it right away, because he has flown a nano quadcopter before. My son took a little teaching from my husband,but he peixked it up soon after. The copter is a bit noisy, & it actually goes pretty high up into the air. If you don't know what you're doing, be careful because my son accidentally flew the nano into my husbands arm & he actually got a little cut, so before you try to fly this in a more public setting, practice in the backyard. After my son got the hang if it,my husband took him to the park & they flew it there. It stays charged for around 5 minutes, then has to be recharged. It provided my husband & son a nice, fun day together. This is a good beginners nano copter. This comes with extra propellers in case some break, we haven't had to use these yet. With the holidays coming up, I definitely recommend this as a gift, I'm actually getting another for my nephew. I received this @ no cost for providing my honest opinion.

Our Bailey girl came running in the room the very second I unscrewed the cap!! I supposed she sniffed them out from the other room, but I don't smell anything. She must love the taste, because after I gave her the very first one, she begged for more. They must be pretty tasty to have Bailey girl beggin'!! She has been starting to show signs of joint pain. She was very stiff in the morning & had started limping now & then after a long run or trip to the dog park. These soft chews seem to do the trick. No more limping & even on cold mornings he gets up & down easily. I received this @ no cost for providing my honest opinion.

I got this for my brother that is a body builder. The following review is his words, as I gifted this to him. -It's a great belt! I have used some of my friends very expensive belts in the past, but I did not want to invest that much money yet! I love to power lift & for where my weights are at is more than sufficient! Squat 455lbs & dead 520lbs just to give you an idea of the quality of this belt. I would recommend.-  I received this @ no cost for providing my honest opinion.

If you are tired of your baby drooling all over everything near their mouths, then buy one of these necklaces & put it on your baby, asap!  When we first got an amber necklace, we realized there was no more drool.  We thought it might have been a fluke, so we took it off our son, & within a few hours, he was drooling, everywhere.  We put it back on him, & surprise, surprise..no drool!  With our daughter, we gave her one before teething ever started, & she has never drooled because of teething.  We have had to use Tylenol in conjunction with the necklace when teething gets really bad, but getting teeth is easier on baby (& mom!) when they are wearing one of these necklaces. I also have one of these for inflammation issues caused by an autoimmune disease. I feel that I am definitely receiving benefits from my amber necklace. I wear mine as a bracelet around my wrist. I received this @ no cost for providing my honest opinion.

Well if you think you are walking enough or not enough per day, you will be surprised to know either way! AThere are distances that I go routinely  & surprisingly is quite a distance. Then there are ones I thought were about 5000 steps & they ended up only being 3000! This device even though you may think it is not working correctly at times, will set the record straight. As a result of walking more, you will sleep better which is also good for you. A well thought out & reliable instrument which I would recommend to anyone wanting a simple & completely reliable pedometer. I received this @ no cost for providing my honest opinion.

I know how much men love a remote control. So I just knew my husband would be up for a little playtime with me, if it had to do with him using a remote!! This little gem is the perfect toy for couples, you get the thrill, while he gets control. Just pop these tiny little eggs into your panties within the vicinity of your hoo ha & its surrounding area, then just forget about it. One evening while out in a nice restaurant, just try imagining this scene. A table for two in your favorite place, it’s a weekend night & the place is jammin'!! You have your double egg in your panties & your man has the remote in his pocket. At any given time he could flick the button & the egg will burst into one of its many different vibrating settings. The wait of the anticipation is incredible, you don’t know when he will push that button, or even if he will. Having to not give away what is or is not happening under the table to your fellow diners is also quite exhilarating. Feeling the little eggs on your most sensitive spots, is a real turn on, especially as someone else is in control of your pleasure. This for my hubby anyway, is a real power trip & he loves giving it to me or taking it away & leaving me with wanting more. If you don’t have one you need one. This is great for beginners, because of the multi speed settings. I received this @ no cost for providing my honest opinion.

My daughter used this raincoat last night @ a high school football game. It was drizzling, but the game must go on! She was so greatful that she brought it with her, while her friends got all wet & were cold, my daughter stayed toasty & dry. What makes this raincoat extra special & unique, is that it has a connected hood. My daughter couldn't tell me enough how much she loved & appreciated this feature. The raincoat is pink & that's her favorite color, so she liked wearing it & it looked nice over her shirt with her jeans.

I have oily & sensitive skin hence not many products work for me. After using this product for two weeks, my skin feels hydrated & much brighter & smoother. This product absorbs very well into the skin as a result it feels light even after applying my moisturizer,  sunscreen & makeup. Also, I noticed it lightened my pimple marks! A product I would recommend for people whom have the same skin type as me. I received this @ no cost for providing my honest opinion.

This is a super cute party dress. I originally wondered if I would have to mess with the sleeves because a lot of the time when clothes say "off the shoulder" I eventually have to pull down the sleeves on my own, but this is NOT the case with this dress. I am 5'6 with a thin build, the fit was totally on point!! It's fitted & has a comfortable, soft material. I wore it the day I received it, with sexy heels & a gold necklace. It's in the way you style it, but the simplicity is the beauty. This dress is extremely club worthy! Add a plum lip & a tassel necklace and you have a very sexy, very modern Bohemian babe look. The possibilities are endless with this dress. One of my favorite black dresses in my closet!! I received this @ no cost for providing my honest opinion.

I love this product! The smell is amazing & subtle @ the same time. It's rich & creamy. Feels great when I put this on after my shower, or even on completely dry skin. This tub of cream seems like it will go a really long way. Moisturizes intensely, feels great and melts into my skin without applying a ton of it. I can go on & on, it's that moisturizing!! I received this @ no cost for my honest opinion.

This whiteboard was a hit with my four year old niece!! These come in either pink or blue, which is great because my nieces favorite color is pink! I was going to save it for her for xmas, but I couldn't resist giving it to her. She just started preschool last month & can write her name now & she loves drawing animals. This whiteboard will be both fun & also educational for her. It comes with two whiteboard washable markers, a nice large sized eraser & also two magnetic pink smiley faces. We used these to hang a picture of a kitty cat on the board that my niece was attempting to draw. This board gives my niece hours of quiet fun & my sister & brother in law love that it is a "quiet" toy. I will be purchasing the blue one for my nephew for xmas because he is now wanting one of his own after playing with his sisters. I received this @ no cost for providing my honest opinion.

After having dyed her hair a gazillion colors for the past 5 years, my daughter is now wanting to start to highlight it. Her hair is so dry, damaged, & split from all the bleach. Even after she cut a few inches off, it still felt like hay & looked damaged. I bought every hydrating/moisturizing hair mask I could find for her. This one takes the cake by far! It made her hair soft, shiny, & rinses clean with no residue. It blew the previous hair masks we tried on her, out of the water. We LOVE it!! I received this @ a discount for providing my honest opinion.

I have fine textured, thick (a lot of) slightly wavy hair. I am on a lot of meds due to an autoimmune disease & unfortunately my hair has been falling out, but not noticeably, since I luckily have a lot. I decided to try a non-sulfate shampoo since that's all the rage & I'm always looking for the next thing that will make my hair beautiful. I wash my hair 2-3 times per week. I saw results with this shampoo in three days. It is like a miracle. My hair actually stopped coming out & also stopped breakage. I never really cared because there's still so much hair on my head, but once I noticed it wasn't coming out anymore I was thrilled!! With ingredients like Argan oil, keratin & jojoba oils, this is an excellent moisturizing shampoo.Gentle & not heavy. Leaves my hair feeling clean & soft with plenty of body!! I received this @ a discount for providing my honest opinion.

Not only do these bags work great, they are sooo cute looking as well. Since two come in a set, I decided on putting one in my truck & giving the other to my mother that never goes anywhere without our dog, Bailey girl. My truck has a leaking sunroof, that drops of water come through when it rains & also when the snowmelts on top of it in winter. We try & dry it & air it out, but it still gets a stale, musty smell every now & then. I had this bag hanging in my truck for close to two weeks now & it even rained hard outside here yesterday & when I got in my truck this morning, the musty odor was non-existant. Score!! My mothers car has also never smelled fresher. She usually uses the tree air fresheners that smell too strong & just cover up the smell with strong scents.This bag doesn't cover the dog smell in her car up...it actually dissappates the smell & gets rid of it all together. No more dog smell in moms car has her over the moon with greatfulness! Now people won't get in her car anymore & say "what is that smell...your dog"?!!? If you are wanting to rid a car, a room, a fridge, a garage etc..., look no further! I received these @ no cost for providing my honest opinion.

I was thin my whole life, even after I had my three children. I was diagnosed with an autoimmune disease & put on intravenous steroids to decrease inflammation present in my body. I gained close to 100 lbs. over about two-three years of being on this medicine. I am now off the meds & lost a significant amount of weight just being off them. I still want to lose @ least 40-50 lbs., but due to my illness, can't do too much exercising. I am eating small portions & dieting, so this combo kit will for sure come in handy for me & my weight lose journey. I have never used a body fat test caliper before, but the instructions & resources I found on how to use this, made it super easy for me (I like easy!). It will determine my body fat. I just simply slid the slider to the right hand side of the caliper. I took a big grab of skin in my right hand & pressed the skin between the caliper & slid over the slider until it stops & that measures the fat. I then used the chart provided with my order, to compare with my age range & also to record my progress. It is suggested that if you are on the heavier side to use the tape measure. It is a nice little tape measure too. It is like a fabric & it comes out of a plastic piece & then after you put it around to measure any area, you can then lock it into position with a clip. I always am searching for a good, quality tape measure when I am being fitted for clothing, or getting my children's measurements for garments. This will definitely come in handy. I received this @ no cost for providing my honest opinion.

I had planned on sewing something similar, even had the fabric, when I had the opportunity to get these. They are light filtering & exactly what I was looking for. Lets light in, but provides privacy. Love the look & also the feel. Casual chic!! Although, I wasnt positive these would fit our front window, in the end the fit was perfect. I raised the rod up & it elongated the window area. My husband made a bay window rod from purchased brackets, added dowel rods & spray painted them all black. The entire effect came out better than we had expected & the contrast of the dark rod against the light airy, sheer curtains is charming in my opinion. The white sheer color is also nice because my dog can get her nose on them (to look out the window) but you can't see any smudge marks on the curtains. I think they will be very easy to machine wash but have not needed to yet. I received these @ no cost for providing my honest opinion.

I decided to use this storage bin on a shelving unit in my laundry room. The capacity of the bin is good for keeping numerous items grouped together like my laundry products, cleaning cloths, duster refills, dry mop refills, cleaning sprays, etc. This sturdy bin gives the room a neat, uniform front instead of the cluttered appearance of assorted everyday products just laying about. I love the country style look that this bin gives the room as well. It woukd be a nice added touch to any room. Looks very classic, yet stylish. The fabric is a quality flax fabric that is tan with a white outline. This color scheme would go great with any colored room. Everyone should have one or many of these bins...they are so useful. I received this @ no cost for providing my honest opinion.

I was referred to try this by a friend & I ran it by my rheumatologist who was on board with me trying this. I have an autoimmune disease & have been diagnosed for 5 years now. It depletes me of energy, gives me anxiety & depression, arthritis etc... I am always searching high & low for anything to help me in this journey of trying to feel normal again. After researching shilajit thoroughly, like I would with anything I put into my body. I found out that shilajit is purest in its resin form, which this product is. It is sourced from "rock sweat" at high altitudes & contains over 85 trace elements & minerals that everyones body needs to function optimally & also includes fulvic acid, which helps the body absorb these minerals at a cellular level. With my research done....it was now time to try this exciting, new super food supplement. I decided to take my pea-sized amount of shilajit mixed with a spoon into an 8 oz. glass of water. At first glance, my honest reaction was...NO WAY am I drinking this!! Then, I thought to myself, but what if... What if this stuff, as funky as it looks, can help me?!!? I bit the bullet & just took a huge, quick gulp real fast. Ehh, not too bad. To me, it tastes a bit like black liquorice & I am not a fan of liquorice. If you like liquorice, you'll love the taste, but it isn't my favorite. Not a big deal for me, as most things that are good for us, don't necessarily taste good to us!! It has now been 15 days & I have taken one pea-sized portion daily as directed in the instructions, usually with water, sometimes mixed into juice. I feel that my energy level has gone up, not too much, but a noticeable little jump. Also, I feel that my head has been clearer. My worries haven't been getting to me like they usually do. I'm not 100% sure its the shilajit working, but I haven't been doing anything else differently lately, so I'm figuring it must be. I will continue taking this as long as it continues to make me feel more energized & helps my well-being. Please if you are reading this because you are thinking of trying this, don't let the look & smell (which isn't too bad either), stop you...you'll be glad you tried it & so will your body, mine is!! I received this @ no cost for providing my honest opinion.

These tablecloth clips are perfect for holding plastic tablecloths onto picnic tables. I gave these to my mother & she said she wished she had them all summer. My parents throw a lot of BBQ's & we have a rather large family. We need two picnic tables+ to accommodate everyone. Mom puts a plastic tablecloth from the local dollar store on the table & she has tried to tack them on with no success & this summer she resorted to taping them underneath with ductape. That held, but the tablecloth ripped in that area & it was very unsightly. Mom & I grabbed a plastic cloth & went outside to check to see exactly how to put these clips on. Its really self explanatory, they just slip right onto the corner. Looks MUCH better & classier than tape or tacks. Mom's happy to have them for next springs start of the BBQ season. I received these @ no cost for providing my honest opinion.

If you are looking to read a story that will draw you in, touch your heart and leave you feeling like you actually stepped back in time then A Cup Of Dust is for you. This story takes readers back to the Dust Bowl introducing us to ten year old Pearl Spence and her family. This story is told with such clarity that it was easy to imagine being there. Ms. Finkbeiner creates characters that are easy to bond with, especially the main character Pearl. I couldn't wait to learn what her story was, and the author provided a few twists that were heart touching. Anyone interested in reading about the Dust Bowl should read this one, but honestly this is just a great story that allows us to witness the coming of age of a young girl during a difficult time in history.Ms Finkbeiner is a new to me author but this work left me wanting to read more from her.A complimentary copy of this book was provided for review.

The deer have been eating the bark off of the trees in Scott County Park, and the plan is that the hunters will "thin" the herd by shooting at them. The Christmas Cats decide that they need to come up with a plan to save the deer! What will they do to save the deer while also appeasing the town who is upset that the deer are eating the bark on their park trees?The Christmas Cats in Silly Hats are back again and this time they are out to save Deer. While the illustrations in this book are beautiful they convey emotion especially on the faces of the deer! Young readers will be drawn to the pictures and understand what the deer are feeling even before the words are read. The rhyming prose of this story make for an enjoyable read and the positive messages just might spark conversations with young readers about helping others and finding solutions to problems. The author also includes a coloring page and maze at the end of the story. The Christmas Cats Fear for the Deer is a wonderful addition to anyone's Christmas collection. Beautiful illustrations will capture youngsters eye and imagination,and the positive messages sprinkled with humor will certainly make this a favorite Christmas read.A complimentary copy of this book was provided for review.

I have enjoyed reading this entire series and looked forward to seeing how Kim Vogel Sawyer would wrap things up with this third, and final installment of The Zimmerman Restoration series. With this book we get to reconnect with old characters while we also meet a few new ones. I must admit I am glad that the author provided a bit of refresher information so that I could reconnect with the characters and their stories. It has been interesting to see how Suzanne sort of comes full circle in this trilogy. The author tackles several topics such and one is being an unwed mother, Suzanne was a pregnant teen sent away twenty years earlier, now she has come home to take care of her mother.  Paul Aldrich is the father of the baby Suzanne had, now that she is back the old feelings start to resurface. What does God ultimately have in store for this couple.This is a story about healing families and healing hearts. The author wraps up all of the loose ends, and provided an ending that was quite satisfying. As part of a trilogy I highly recommend reading these books in order to fully understand the characters. Overall a great series that I hate to see end.A complimentary copy of this book was provided for review.

I love reading stories about dogs and Jim Kraus has written more than a few that were great, including his latest one The Dog That Saved Stewart Coolidge.Stewart Coolidge works at the local grocery store as a bag boy. When a stray dog continues to come in and steal chew bones his boss isn't happy and demands that Stewart catch him. While he doesn't  catch him, the dog does show up at his apartment building and Stewart decides to let him in, little does he know just how much this dog will change his life!Reading this story was a no brainer for me, after all I love stories that revolve around animals, but it was the  powerful messages woven through out the story that makes this one a stand out memorable read! I certainly enjoyed the small town feel of this book, and the wonderful cast of characters that we meet. The three central characters are Calvin, a young man who is a college graduate working as a bag boy, his neighbor Lisa, who works as a waitress, and a stray dog that they name Hubert. It was neat to see the story unfold through the eyes of the various characters especially the dog. While there are more than a few laughs there are several moments that made me pause and think as well. I loved the ending and was left feeling better for having read the story. A complimentary copy of this book was provided for review.

99 Prayers for Children is a beautifully illustrated book that youngsters will enjoy looking at while they read, or have read to them the prayers that are included. This is a very sturdy hard back book with a colorful cover that certainly captured my eye. Inside the first thing I looked for was a presentation page, and yes it's there, this book would make a wonderful gift, I could even see giving this as a shower gift for a new baby so the parent could read it nightly to their youngster. The prayers are simply written which is perfect for a new reader because they will be reading along in no time at all. The colorful illustrations are paired perfectly with the prayers. As an animal lover I loved the cats and dogs that were included in the illustrations, and one of my favorite had to be Thank You God which is based on Psalm 106:1 it really  put a smile on my face. Another great thing about each prayer is that the scripture reference is  included at the end so you can look up the scripture the prayer is based on if you so choose. Overall, I love this little book and think it would make a wonderful gift. Perfect for bedtime or anytime your youngster wants to be read to. What a wonderful way to encourage little ones to pray to their heavenly father.A complimentary copy of this book was provided for review

I love books that pull me into a small town setting where the characters are easy to know and care for, making me feel as if I become a part of the town for a short time, and that's just what I found within the pages of The Splendor Of Ordinary Days by Jeff High. Even though the town of Waterford doesn't always embrace newcomers the residents don't hesitate to know what everyone is doing. Typical small town where everyone knows everyone's business, and that among other things makes this story a winner.  Let me begin by saying that I had never heard of this series until I picked up this book to read, and while I was able to follow the story line, I feel like I was have to go back and read the first two books in the series, because I don't want to miss anything about these characters or the town. . With that said, the comparisons to Jan Karon's Mitford series is spot on, there is a gentleness in reading these stories that draws me in, allowing me to become immersed in the day to day lives of the characters, the good the bad and the funny. This story provided more than an few chuckles, while also providing a bit of mystery. There is even an Amish community in the story which was an added bonus for me. Overall, I really enjoyed reading this story, and will be reading the first two in the series.A complimentary copy of this book was provided for review.

Catbird Singing is the second book in the Amish Horses Series by Thomas Nye and I really think it's better than the first book if that is at all possible.It's been two summers since Lenny  Gingerich spent the summer on his grandfather's Amish farm,and at that time he was figuring out who he was, and while he has figured that out he still isn't sure where his life is going. He still feels drawn to his Amish family, and misses the farm life, so when he finds himself on the interstate in Iowa during a major storm he decides to  visit his Amish uncle Noah. He finds that his world is still changing when he finds himself drawn to a particular Amish girl, thing is how does she feel? Will Lenny stick around for awhile on his uncle's farm, one things for sure there is sure to be plenty of interesting things going on.Mr. Nye has a way of drawing me into his stories, allowing me to feel as if I have actually stepped into the shoes of his characters. His writing is richly descriptive, bringing his characters and setting to life with such clarity, that I actually miss them when I finish the final page of the book. I really enjoy reading about the Amish lifestyle and we certainly get a day to day glimpse of that. While I considered the last book to be a coming of age story for Lenny, I feel like he is still coming into his own with this book, we see him mature more, but still I feel like he is evolving into the person he will become. I love his sidekick and always enjoy whenever an animal plays a part in the plot. Overall, a great story that leaves me anxious to read more from this author. While this book is the second in The Amish Horses Series it can be read as a stand alone work because I feel like the author provides enough background information that the reader won't be lost, but if you enjoy good, clean Amish stories that capture the essence of Amish living I highly recommend both books.A complimentary copy of this book was provided for review.

Katie Vale has just traveled half way across the country with her boyfriend to spend Christmas with his family. Within minutes of arriving, in front of all of his family he pops the question!  Her answer isn't was what expected though, which might make for an uncomfortable Christmas. Why did she say no, and how can she stay for Christmas with his family now? Well she does, and the lessons she learns will change the way she thinks about family.A fast paced, heart touching story that pulled me right into t he midst of the Bender family. It was interesting to see the story unfold through the eyes of Katie, who really hasn't experienced a family like the Benders before. The characters in the family really propelled this novel along at break neck speed, never once did the plot lag, instead it moved along so fast that I found myself rereading some things just to catch what the author was trying to convey. I wondered from the beginning how life would work out for the main characters. The author begins the book with the marriage proposal and then takes the reader back to allow us to see what transpired, giving the story of the characters, making it easy to understand why Katie gave the answer she did. I couldn't help but wonder what would happen with Katie and Micah, and really felt like her staying with the family would be awkward, bu instead it made for a great story.
