Since these great pillows are getting harder to find, and are getting more expensive, I decided to clean mine before throwing it away. I mean, it was going in the trash anyway so why not?I got a sponge dampish-wet and wiped across the fabric (since it's a knit, I wiped across the ribs rather than "with" the direction of the ribs). I was SHOCKED! The soil was coming off! Not that the pillow was disgustingly filthy, but after a year of touching it daily it did get a little grungy. Even a couple of chocolate spots (ok, busted!) came out. The fabric must be stain or spot repellant.Don't get the sponge too wet though. After going over the entire surface I hung it outside. Really it was barely damp. Took about an hour to dry and it looks great.Only then did I examine the big tag on my new one to discover "TO CLEAN: Wipe surface with damp cloth."!!!The only reason I can think of to replace the pillows more than every few years is the beads/pellets, whatever, seem to compress. My old one isn't as firm as the new one.
Just as described. Works wells. I like the wooden handle rather than a plastic one which can melt near the stove.

Since I saw this in a theatre during its initial showing, I have loved Robert Stephens as Sherlock. He has just the right amount of theatrics and tongue-in-cheekness. However, I recently read some reviews on IMDb that the film was cut badly and Billy Wilder was very disappointed. I never knew that for all the other times I've seen the film, and it didn't really bother me. But now I would have loved to have seen it as he originally intended.

Obviously points out that some people just can't face their own mortality without having the crutch of "God" or an afterlife. A few uncomfortable moments with people who didn't like to be made fun of, but overall pretty fair and balanced. I wouldn't recommend it to an Evangelical or devout Christian though!
The show was really fun, made me want to rewatch TWIN PEAKS and DUAL SPIRES again! But the host was a MUMBLER!  :-(

The size is perfect for 2 fried eggs, or 3 scrambled eggs. It doesn't tip over on the burner like the cheaper, lightweight pans. I'm very happy with T-fal products and would always buy them for non-stick, and Calphalon for stainless steel. One doesn't have to replace pans very often, so why not start with really good ones even if they are more expensive!?
Does exactly what it says! I have several for use with my dishes and glasses, keeping one specifically for the hummingbird feeder. Lasts a really long time without disintegrating.
I know a lot of people like this series, but, to me, it was just shallow. I will stick with Grisham!
It is exactly the color as pictured. This is my second one of this type, a sort of terry cloth material. Fits my 16oz Rubbermaid bottles perfectly. Absorbs condensation, and is washable.
The butterflies really are three dimensional. Exactly as pictured.Good quality, and so cute! Brightens up my Alice in Wonderland-themed bathroom. (Bread-and-Butterflies!)

With at least 8000 free salad dressing recipes on the Internet and a clean, used, commercial dressing glass bottle, I'm not really sure why one needs to spend $15 for this gadget? I know gadgets are fun, I have drawers full, but there comes a point when one has to question another THING!

These are the best tv-watching snack around! Only ONE INGREDIENT! (except for my favorite ones, the apple cinnamon and then it's only TWO ingredients!) And they're organic! What's not to love? Try dipping in peanut butter, or crumble on yogurt! Really fill the "crunch" need when potato or corn chips aren't on the menu.
This s such a fun book for anyone who is a fan of Dr. Seuss. All phases of his long career are addressed with lots of illustrations.
It's good and healthful. No wheat nor fillers. Veggies and wholesome ingredients.And my dog really likes it when she occasionally gets finicky about her raw food.
It's good and healthful. No wheat nor fillers. Veggies and wholesome ingredients.And my cat really likes all the flavors.
It's good and healthful. No wheat nor fillers. Veggies and wholesome ingredients.And my cat really likes all the flavors.
After two months of taking two caps a day, I see a noticeable difference in my nails. What more could one ask?

I had no problem choosing, and receiving, my colors. I emailed the company beforehand and inquired. They were more than helpful and I got what I ordered. These are so much better than what I was using... Eight 99 store towels sewn together! The shipping speed was REALLY quick considering the package came from China, and very well and carefully packed. I'm very happy with the company, the product, and the customer service.

Dr. Bieler was our family doctor until he retired. He was a wonderful, warm and sensitive man. I never felt like I was 'going to see the doctor' when I had an appt as a child. I don't know if it was unusual, but he saw us in his home office in San Juan Capistrano, Southern California. He was a wood carver and made beautiful little bears, one of which he gave me and I treasure it still. Bieler Broth is quite popular now as a liver cleanse, and it really works. I'm so glad this book is still in print as the copy I inherited from my mom is on its last legs.

It really REALLY works.Outline your lips (not on your lips, but on the skin around your lips), and apply any shade of lipstick.Lasts 4-6 hours.I love this product. I can finally wear lipstick again and not have to worry about looking like I'm bleeding!;-(

Its very well made and sturdy. The rubbery exterior feels so nice, the mirrors are very clear, 3X size is awesome, normally I got headache when I looked into magnified mirror but not with this one. Just wish there is color options.

This is the most gorgeous train case and the color Pink/purple is just wonderful. It does look expensive yet due to the sturdy structure, its quite heavy. It stores and organize a lot of my make up. From inside out, everything is extremly fine and durable, plus there was no offensive smell. However when I pull out the trays completely, it tilts backward no matter how many items I put in the base to maintain its balance. But dont worry, that issue isnt that bad, just keep those trays at 90 degrees angle which infact, I found its easier to reach for my stuffs.
I chose blue paw what looks very cute and shiny. All of 4 lines were engraved on the smooth side. The engraving is ok but the blue paint sucks, it chips off right away when I attatched the ring.

The pad is actually just a thin training pad, I've thought it was kind of foam pad or something, the water/food cup is extremely cheaply made, thin plastic, the cup's divider was even dent, and please note some airlines prefer Food and Water in 2 separate cups, minus mine came all scratched. And there are just 2 Live Animal stickers while it should be 2 on sides and one on top. Although I purchased this kit mainly because of the metal nuts & bolts to fit Petmate Vari kennel 300, but still be quite disappointed with this valueless kit.UPDATE: the day I went to American Air Cargo, they gave me everything: zip ties ( their zip ties are a lot bigger ), the paper form, many Live Animal stickers to stick around the kennel. They didnt even care about the bowls, I asked if I need to fill water and food in, they said no ( coz my pet just flew for 3 hours ). And the original metal screws with plastic nuts that came with the kennel were good enough, I didnt have to replace with these metal nuts in this kit. The paper Pet ID tag wasnt necessary, your dog still can wear collar with his own beautiful tag.

I purchased size 29x20, sold by Amazon. The bed came in perfect condition in neatly packaging. Its very soft, thick yet lightweight. However its not plush and the material feels like nylon fiber, (the tag says its Acrylic fiber) although the blue print side is a bit more velvety, It fits ok in Petmate Vari kennel 32" and my corgi loves it, he laid on the bed instantly when I just pulled it out.

This is somewhat one of the best silicone cases for Tab 8.4 while there are not many cases like this on the market. It does support easier grip, sturdy and protects the device well, reach and press buttons like a breeze. I have read that people complained about this case is too soft which made the tablet fell out if your thumb accidentally hit the edge. Well, in my experience, it didnt happen, I would need to pull the edge hard to make the tablet fall out. So everything met my expectation except the color, lavender is far different from the picture, its like purple/grape 🍇

Very very gorgeous and well made!! Like a beautiful butterfly on my hair, looks so romantic and feminine 😍 Plus it holds shoulder length hair well without pulling it tight. However its not suit for long or thick hair due to the open claw isnt very wide.

Its oval shape alike Sigma but quality is very different, it was smelly when opened and I could see glue stained along the edges, material is somewhat made by thin, cheap faux leather, not very well made tho! Inside is just 2.8" width, I couldnt store many medium to full size brushes, about 6 at best. In the picture, those were 2 full sizes brushes Real Techniques Face Powder, BDellium Tools 990, 2 medium were Make up for Ever 160 Pointed Blush and BDellium 962

I have tried Pet Magasin, Vet Professional clippers and a few more that I dont even remember the brands. But non of those met my satisfaction. Always saw Safari when I was searching but assummed with this price, it would be a piece of junk. Finally I tried the SMALL/MEDIUM one today, omg I wished I purchased this one at the first place. It helped me did straight cut quickly without squishing my son's nails altho size S/M is a bit small for him who is a corgi 24 pounds.This clipper feels light weight and compact with soft grip, very easy to control. The safety stop guard works as it should, blade is sharp and sturdy. Its everything I was expected but at the cheapest price ✌️Stop wasting your time looking else where, give this one a try! However I recommend the larger one for pet of 20-24 pounds and up. Below I attached a picture of the Small/Medium with a women clipper for you to compare sizes

PROS:- Fits iphone 6 perfectly! Sturdy phone case helps protect phone well- Fine material, non sharp edges, light weight- Imprinted leather pattern on the back that looks expensive- LAKERS logo ❤️CONS:- DOESNT look glowy and attractive like in pictureAt all, its still a very nice phone case at affordable price. I like it tho ;)

Everything is as described. This brush looks expensive and well made. The brush itself is 3.5", extend to 7.5" with the cap snap on the bottom so you can easily adjust the handle length for your convenience. Bristle is firm yet softer from the middle to the tip what help its being sturdy yet stil flexible. However, I think its better for touch up than draw a precise liner due to the too soft tip.For who wants soft lip brush, this is a must have. But for some who enjoy their firm lip brush like Real Techniques Retractable, you may skip this one. At all, its a happy purchase for me, at this price I have a sleek brush which works well at home and awesome to carry in purse, nothing to complain 😊

2:55 MinsDimension for the large one: length 16.5", width 8.5", height 4" from the ground. Inside bowl: 5.5" diameter, 2.5" depth.Bowls are made by durable silicone with hard plastic rim, each one holds exactly 2.5 cups.I bought this feeder for my corgi 10 months old and Its suit him well so for daily home use, I dont recommend it for larger doggies. The pink one is very cute yet brighter than Amazon picture, it looks like bright fuchsia. Legs are sturdy but also open/fold easily.  One thing I dont like that water splash and stuck under the rim everytime my baby drinks. At all, this feeder is still very nice with fine material and not too expensive.
These unscented bags are large with nice colors yet pretty thin. Somehow I feel that I paid for the Halloween printed on it, coz quality isnt that much.

2:55 MinsDimension for the large one: length 16.5", width 8.5", height 4" from the ground. Inside bowl: 5.5" diameter, 2.5" depth.Bowls are made by durable silicone with hard plastic rim, each one holds exactly 2.5 cups.I bought this feeder for my corgi 10 months old and Its suit him well so for daily home use, I dont recommend it for larger doggies. The pink one is very cute yet brighter than Amazon picture, it looks like bright fuchsia. Legs are sturdy but also open/fold easily.  One thing I dont like that water splash and stuck under the rim everytime my baby drinks. At all, this feeder is still very nice with fine material and not too expensive.

The tube I received in Orange/Blue, not Orange/Yellow as Amazon picture. Purchased on August 2014, exp date was 07/16 (printed on top), Made in USA. Its texture blends in perfectly, didnt leave white cast or oily residue and very comfortable to wear. It has light citrus scent, but dont worry the scent isnt overpowering at all and gone in minutes. I like that this suncreen doesnt dry out  my skin yet still protects it well. About the ingredients, I've emailed the company for the difference between THINKSPORT & THINKBABY. They responsed that both have the same ingredients, but one used currant and one used papaya just to mask Zinc oxide smell. The only cons for me is the price for just a little amount, and it does run out really fast !!

I bought Bright Fuchsia to covers my legs while driving. The blanket is soft, super lightweight and does the job well. However, its smaller than I expected, Im petite and it has enough room for my legs. So for baby, I think its suit for infants to 4months only due to its size. The color is nice but looks quite different in person, Bright Fuchsia is more on the side of Pink Coral and does not look dark like website picture.

Its so beautiful although color is darker than picture. It files my nails very smoothly and fast. Easier to hold than Nail Tek mini crystal file. Came with blue plastic tube in a white box which can be a great gift.

It gives significant curl in a flash, does not pinch eyelids, I love that I can curl my lashes close to the lids with its flat edge so my lashes look longer. Plus they have many lovely colors, material is fine and durable, pad is very cushiony. I have tried Dior, Lancome, Shiseido curlers but finally cameback to this one. However , I think its suit Asian eye shape more, too narrow for bigger eyes.

I have #3 Red brown & #04 Natural brown. They covers and keep my brows in shape, didnt smudge even in hot weather. About the colors, I prefer 04 which is soft ash brown, it does look harmony even when my hair is black or I dyed it in beige or brown.#03 Red brown is really a chocolate brown with just a tiny hint of red. If your hair is dark burgundy, it can be a good choice, for brighter red hair, I dont think its suit for. FYI, Kiss Me Isehan has Eyebrows color in Red, so you may want to consider it.Im Asian, I would stay away #03 and even Rich brown #01, coz they are way too dark that make me looks mean :[

At first I ordered Kizmos Get Happy measuring cups but I received them in bad condition and they were somewhat bulky, plus crispy clear plastic. So I just returned them and purchased these Flower cups. Im so happy I did :)) These are duper cute and very functional, easy to clean. Due to the design, its size is taller & compact, the smaller ones fit neatly in the biggest "1 cup". The material is good quality plastic with non sharp edges, it feels sturdy and ordorless also.The color I received from Amazon ( I placed order in another account ) was different in a better way. Mine was Mauve, Orange, Yellow and Purple with a cutie green Leaf to hook them together. These cups make my day, now I love measuring so much ^^

Before ordering this console, I honestly side eyed a lot of the glowing 5 star reviews that casually mentioned that they received this console free of charge in exchange for a review. Too good to be true right? Curiosity won me over in the end and I figured since the console was Amazon prime eligible, a return would be painless if the 5 star reviews were stretching the truth.The console arrived yesterday and it appears that I'll be eating my hat. Its design is well thought out and nothing short of amazing! We also own the Britax console and have used that for two years now. There's nothing wrong with the Britax console. The design of that is simple and it has worked for our basic needs. I still remember actually hesitating on purchasing the Britax console because it just seemed so simple for the price tag but I was a first time mom and I really just wanted the console brand to match the stroller. Those pregnancy hormones can wreak havoc on one's logic but I digress. I purchased the Britax console 2 years ago for $24 and this console a few days ago for $25. I have to say, this is worth every penny. The Britax one not so much.I'd say the Spark and Bee console is a greatly improved version of the Britax one. The cupholders are deeper so I don't have to worry about drinks pitching or flopping out. My iPhone 6 (in a Speck candy shell case) fits easily in the left mesh pocket. I'd be hesitant to say that any phone/case bigger than that would fit easily though. I love the three zippered compartments: two in the front and one mesh zippered compartment underneath the lid of the middle flap. One thing I've learned about being a mom and organized is that compartments are key in retaining your sanity. My keys fit easily with tons of room to spare in the largest zippered compartment. Credit cards can be slid effortlessly in and out of the zippered mesh compartment. Love that it's mesh so I can also easily see what's in there. Like I said, very well thought out design.Quality appears to be exceptional. Zippers run smooth and don't feel cheap. Seams are clean and tight. The middle flap is secured with a strong magnet. Material feels substantial. I'll update if I run into any problems with durability but as of now, this baby looks solid. The console itself fits easily on our BOB Revolution Flex and looks great. This is definitely one of those products I'll be recommending to all of my friends who are expecting.

Worked perfectly on our toddler's wooden step stool. We own the KidKraft step stool in the natural wood finish. I really liked the appearance of the natural wood, but the steps were extremely slippery. I hated the idea of covering up the wood with anti-skid tape so I'm relieved that I happened upon this non-skid spray.I followed the directions to a tee and did two, rather liberal coats. The spray dried clear. It is only discernible to me because I know how glossy the finish was prior to spraying the step stool. Feel wise, I'd liken it to a really fine sandpaper - not rubbery whatsoever. It gives my toddler enough traction without being rough on her feet.

Stool is built to be very sturdy. The lack of any curse words from my boyfriend while he built it suggests that it was straightforward and easily to assemble. The only drawback - and in my book, a rather big one - is that the step stool is slippery! As in it slides around on our tiled bathroom floor. As in our toddler has slipped while using it, even in bare feet.To remedy this slippery situation, I sprayed Krylon's 3400 Clear Non-Skid Coating on the steps. I initially bought anti-skid tape but was concerned that it'd be too rough on my little one's bare feet. The clear non-skid coat works great and dried clear so we can still enjoy the beautiful natural wood color of the step stool. To keep the step stool from sliding around I used 3M Scotch Rubber Pads, Black, .75-Inch by .16-Inch Rubber Pads. The pads are a little wider than the actual base, but aesthetic wise doesn't look terrible.

I've purchased sunscreens on all ends of the price spectrum. I've come to the realization that I prefer how higher end sunscreens feel, but I found myself trying to use pricey ones sparingly to save money. Which kind of defeats the intent of buying sunscreen in my eyes.I love this particular Anthelios sunscreen because I feel like it's the best of both worlds. Price won't break the bank and yet it has the finish of a more expensive sunscreen. I have dark, olive skin and I love that this sunscreen doesn't leave a white cast on my face. It goes on a little greasy at first and then dries to a more velvet finish. I prefer to apply it and wait 20 minutes or so before putting on my liquid foundation.My skin is sensitive and acne prone - I actually took accutane at one point to clear up my acne. This sunscreen has never broken me out or irritated me. I've used it on my two year old (extremely sensitive skin, eczema problems) in a pinch and it worked well on her as well. I love that I can carry one sunscreen for the whole family.

My 23 month old loves the movie Brave so I searched for a bow and arrows that were age appropriate for her. In addition to being safe for her (i.e. no pointed tipped arrows, etc.) I wanted it to be gender neutral in style/color and affordable. This set seemed to fit the bill. It's available via Prime so I thought I'd take the chance and just order it despite the less than glowing reviews about quality.I definitely agree that the quality isn't the best. Like another review said, if you had the tools I'm sure you could easily make this set yourself. The handle (??) part of the bow was wrapped with a synthetic cord that fell apart within a few minutes of my toddler just holding the bow. The suction cups of the arrows appear chewed up and old; they don't stick to anything. They also aren't attached or glued to the rest of the arrow. The wire cord of the bow has sharp ends as well.I decided to keep this set despite the initial quality. It just needed a little loving. I purchased black leather cord and re-wrapped the handle as well as the tips of the bow to cover the sharp cord ends. I also replaced the strap of the quiver with a braided leather strap that I made from the same leather cord. The last two pictures that I post reflect these changes that I personally made. I also sanded the set down as it was rough and I don't want my toddler getting splinters. I'll also be replacing the suction cup ends.The arrows do shoot an impressive distance although accuracy is questionable. It has the potential to be a great toy, quality is just lacking.

Quality is great. The fleece lining is substantial and the outer tights material doesn't snag or pill easily. Only drawback is that it's borderline uncomfortably snug for me. I'm 5' and 116 lbs and wear a size 25 in pants. These tights fit snug enough to temporarily crush my self-esteem as they coax a magnificent muffin top from my midsection. So in short, great quality.. Size up!

While the print is adorable and on trend, I feel like the quality of this crib sheet is in par with ones I've purchased at Target for $10. For a $30+ crib sheet, I was expecting it to feel more soft than what it actually is. The black print has already started to show some wash wear/fading after two washes with Dreft on gentle cycle, low heat dry. I definitely feel like you're paying for the print and not quality. A bit of a disappointment.

I initially got a different brand of snow boots for my toddler but wound up returning them because they were so difficult to put on. I decided to check out Sorel and I'm so glad I did!I measured my daughter's feet right before ordering the Sorels and she's currently a size 6. I decided to order one size up to leave room for growth and thick socks. They are a bit bulky but after a few steps, my little one was exploring the Michigan wintry wonderland with ease. Paired with the wigwam tot socks, these boots kept her feet warm and happy in the snow. We had to practically drag her back inside.Some details about the boots: the shearling trim doesn't extend past the cuff. The boots are lined with some sort of flat, fleece-like material and they do feel padded. The soles are very stiff. The Velcro straps attach to two points: one in the middle and another on the other side. Very easy to take on and off.

I searched high and low for something to protect my 22 month old's face from the harsh Michigan winter weather. We were initially just slathering Vaseline on her face whenever we went out. Then we tried Vaniply. Still no dice. Plus I hated how greasy ointments are (albeit they are the best emollient for dry skin), especially since my little girl loves to give me hugs and burrow her face into my shirt. Grease stains galore.We've had great experience with Mustela in the past so I was elated to see that they made a cold weather cream. I couldn't find it in any brick and mortar store within the vicinity so I ordered it from Amazon.The consistency of the cream is very thick. I was actually initially irritated with how thick it was (bit of a challenge to squeeze out of the tube). I haven't experienced any issues of a watery consistency that other reviews have noted. I'd assume that the tubes of watery cream are defective in some way.It does have that signature Mustela scent and it comes across very strong. My daughter does struggle with severe eczema and multiple allergies; I'm well aware of the no fragrances, etc. routine but scented Mustela products have never irritated her skin. If I didn't have any previous experience with the Mustela brand, I'd definitely raise an eyebrow over how strong the scent is. Just a caveat if that's important to you.My little one's face was actually peeling and extremely red the past few days from playing out in the snow several times. We thought it was an eczema flare up from an unknown food allergy but her prescription topical steroids weren't helping the way they normally do. I've been slathering this Mustela cream religiously instead of the steroids and it seems to be clearing it all up better than Vaseline, Vanicream, Vaniply, Cerave, Cetaphil, and even our most beloved Stelatopia.I too have patches of eczema so I tested out this cream on myself before putting it on my kid. I've experienced burning, stinging, and an increase in itchiness from tons of different lotions but this Mustela cold cream didn't hurt or increase my itchiness.I've spent a small fortune on lotions, creams, and ointments. Every brand you see in Target, I've tried it. For whatever reason, Mustela just works for my family the best. We'll definitely be getting more.

We have the matching Stonz mittz for our daughter and really liked them so I figured it'd be the same for the booties; unfortunately, I just find the booties to be an awkward fit. In theory, the two bungee cords should make putting the booties on a breeze but I felt like I just couldn't tighten them enough to keep them securely on my little one.I ordered the size 1-2.5 years for my daughter that's 22 months old. She's on the petite side, with a size 5 shoe size (give or take, depending on the brand) and I find that these booties are just too big. I'm aware that the booties are designed to be worn with booties linerz, by themselves, or over another pair of shoes. I opted with purchasing the linerz as the thought of putting a pair of shoes and then having to work booties on top of those shoes on my impatient toddler sounded like torture. I find that the linerz shifted around in the booties and that was irritating. Perhaps it's because the booties themselves are really loose on my kid. Ideally, I want boots for my toddler that I can just easily slip her feet into and call it a day.Unfortunately, I don't like the fit and look enough to keep them but it doesn't necessarily mean they're bad shoes. Quality wise, the stitching is great and the materials used seem quite durable. The sole has a rough texture reminiscent of gritty sand paper. They are also much more lightweight than traditional snowshoes.

We didn't have even one trick-or-treater due to terrible weather on Halloween so we're stuck with all 65 gummy pieces. I didn't take stock of how much we got of each body part like other reviewers, but I was pleasantly surprised with how yummy they actually were. Just the right amount of chewiness in my opinion. My little one has a lot of food allergies so I also like how she's able to enjoy these without any ill effects.

My little girl loves dogs so I knew I had to get these pajamas. I ordered several Leveret 2 piece pajamas in size 2T even though my daughter's currently in 18-24 months. She's also on the petite side. The Leveret pajamas were initially the same as a pair of Baby Gap 2T 2 piece pajamas that we had, but shrank down a size in the wash (cold water gentle cycle and low heat dry). I'd suggest sizing up. The cotton is soft and I like the print a lot. It has shown just a bit more wash wear than our other Leveret pajamas though.

I don't even want to think of how much money I wasted trying to find mittens and gloves that would stay on my strong-willed 1.5 year old. How many times I've wrestled with her to put a pair on, only to have her rip them off with her freakishly Herculean toddler strength within seconds. I'd nearly admitted defeat and let her run around in <50 degree weather sans gloves; however, a recent playground stint, where I felt every pound of judgement pouring out of every parents' eyes upon looking at my bare handed child, spurred me in my quest to find some mittens that would stay put.So imagine my delight when I stumbled upon these Stonz Mittz gloves! I love that it cinches easily in two places. I like that there is no thumb so that's one less thing to worry about as I struggle to coax them on my darling daughter's squirmy, angry fists. She's screamed and howled in disdain over my mitten success (strong-willed, remember?), but at least I can rest a little more easily knowing that her hands are finally sheltered from the elements. The lining is warm and soft. I'm feeling more confident about braving our first Michigan winter now.

After skimming a few reviews on several Leveret 2 piece pajamas, I decided to order some 2T pajamas for my 19 month old who is currently wearing 18-24 months. For reference, my daughter has pajamas predominantly from Baby Gap, Carter's, and Hannah Anderson. We run her pajamas into the ground with how much she wears them so I'm always on the look out for some quality pajamas that will withstand the toddler tornado.I was impressed with the initial softness of the cotton. The softness is reminiscent of the Hannahs that we own; however, the Leveret cotton is notably thinner than that our Hannahs. I compared a never washed pair of Leveret 2T pajamas with a never washed pair of 2T Baby Gap pajamas and they were identical. They even have the identical stitching style on the bum that allows for more room for a diaper. Upon washing both in the same load, the Leverets shrank considerably while the Baby Gap pajamas stayed the same size. The Leveret 2Ts fit my daughter now without having to fold any cuffs over. Size up!We've washed the Leverets multiple times now and they've held up well with minimal wash wear. I'd definitely order again.

I purchased this pillowcase to go along with the pillow that I also purchased from A Little Pillow Company. The quality of the stitching and construction is fine. Plus it fits the pillow perfectly and I do like the envelope style. My issue is that the fabric is a huge disappointment. I'm not a sheets snob by any means but this fabric is disappointingly scratchy. Our cheapest cotton shirts are softer than the white pillowcase that I got. Order with caution.**UPDATE**We've had this pillowcase for less than 3 months and the stitching is already failing. I was pretty disappointed to find out that a corner had come undone. My daughter only uses this pillow to lay her head on during naps and bedtime. We haven't used it for travel or even during playtime, etc. I'm dismayed with the quality.

I really liked the simplistic style of Old Soles petal ballet flats. Unfortunately, my daughter's size was sold out everywhere so I was elated when I came across these flats in a similar style from See Kai Run. My daughter's 18 months and is on the more petite side with a shoe size of just about 4.5. I ordered the 12-18 months as well as the 18-24 months initially. The 12-18 months fit just right with a tiny bit of wiggle room for growth. She can wear thick tights in addition to these flats without any fit problems. I love the way the ankle is padded and the leather is soft. My daughter's a serial shoe remover, but these babies stay securely on her feet.Only downfall is that the leather does scuff somewhat easily. She wore them this past weekend while we visited a pumpkin patch. Now there's already a small nick in the leather around the toe area and we've had the shoes for only a week. It's my fault as in hindsight; I should have just put her in sneakers. I just didn't think twice about babying the leather.

Getting older and going through all the hormonal changes from having a child has really messed with my skin, which wasn't even close to being ideal to begin with. I've always yearned for a gentle cleanser - I have extremely sensitive skin - that is strong enough to remove the liquid foundation that I wear. Paula's Choice Skin Recovery Cleanser is probably my top favorite cleanser of all time. Its price point is cheaper if you were to buy directly from Paula's Choice website; however, they only offer free shipping on orders of $50+. If you're an Amazon Prime member and you're not looking to order anything else from Paula's Choice, I'd say it's priced fairly here.The cleanser's consistency is that of a more milky Cetaphil. It keeps this consistency and doesn't really work into a lather when I wash my face; however, it removes nearly all of my makeup. During the day, I always wear sunscreen and I typically opt to wear liquid foundation that's in the medium-to-full-coverage range (i.e. thick, liquid foundation). The first time I used this cleanser, I was impressed with how efficient it was in removing my makeup. I can tell if a cleanser isn't that efficient because I'll see the traces of foundation on the cotton pads/balls when I use a toner after washing.I never see any residual foundation on the cotton pad after I've used this particular cleanser. It isn't strong enough to remove my waterproof eye makeup completely, but that's why you get a separate eye makeup remover.I've noticed that since using this cleanser, my face stays in the dewy range without going too oily. I love that it doesn't leave you with that super squeaky feeling after washing up. My skincare routine is currently this cleanser, Thayer's witch hazel, Paula's Choice 2% BHA liquid, Paula's Choice C15 super booster, and Paula's Choice moisture boost face cream. I'm still experiencing some breakouts, but the overall texture of my facial skin has improved drastically and it's only been about a month of doing this new skincare regimen.

I believe my boyfriend's words while reading this to our daughter were, "I've watched the movie several times.. This book is really cute." He's not the type to use 'cute' superfluously. Our little one already loves Goodnight Moon so Goodnight Mr. Darcy is a great addition to her bookcase.

For reference, I'm shy of 5', 106 lbs, and 32DD. I ordered a medium because of multiple reviews that stated that the swimsuit ran small. The medium was still way too small in the chest area for my taste and I'm generally comfortable with showing cleavage. Because it was a medium, the suit was ill-fitting on the bottom portion so it made it look sloppy. I think the price is fair for the quality of the suit though. I'd recommend this suit to ladies with smaller chests.

I was torn between the Guava Family (GF) lotus crib and the Baby Bjorn (BB) travel crib. I decided to order both so that I could compare them side by side! Please bear with me as being succinct was never my forte.The carrying cases for both are stylish and subdued.For the BB crib, you can only carry it via two handles on top - much like a brief case. For the GF crib, you have two options: like a brief case or as a backpack. I like how the GF's carrying case gives you two options; however, the quality of the BB carrying case is better. The fabric is noticeably thicker and I suspect may be more durable in the long run if you're rough with your baby gear.The set up design of both cribs is instinctive.I was able to set both up without reading the owner's manual. For the GF crib, the mattress pad is secured via velcro tabs located underneath the pad. You pull the tabs through slots on the bottom of the crib and secure it to velcro tabs there. I was able to do all four velcro tabs just by touch. There's a bit of fumbling but I don't think that necessarily detracts from the ease of set up. I noticed that the mattress pad did pull up at four corners initially, but after a few days it now lays relatively flat.The BB mattress pad is secured via red tabs pulled through corner slots of the crib. They're anchored with a hook-loop mechanism instead of velcro. It was admittedly easier and faster to anchor the BB mattress than it was the GF mattress because I could see what I was doing. The BB mattress pad also initially pulled up at all four corners and is now settling down and laying flat. Neither crib had any discernible odor upon set up.As for the mattress pad, I'd say the BB mattress is double the thickness of the GF mattress. You can order a plush quilted sheet to make the GF mattress softer. I personally prefer the more plush mattress as my child is 15 months; however, I could also see why others would prefer the thinness of the GF mattress. I'd say it's akin to any typical Graco pack'n'play mattress. We have the American Baby Company 100% organic cotton interlock fitted pack'n'play sheet and it fit fine on both mattress pads.I feel that overall, the quality of material is noticeably different. The fabric at the top of the GF crib is not as smooth and luxe to the touch as the BB one is. One review noted that they felt like the former fabric could potentially snag more and I can see that happening. The top fabric parts of both cribs can be zippered off and washed. The mesh material of both feel exactly the same.To take down the GF crib, there are two handles on the top part of the frame that you simply squeeze. The location of the handles is indicated by white circles with upward arrows. For the BB crib, you tug the legs down and fold.Because the GF crib is shaped like a box, its footprint is larger than that of the BB crib. The legs of the GF also stick out further than the BB crib's legs. They're both roughly the same height. In terms of aesthetic appeal, I'd go with the BB crib. It's sleeker and I prefer the all black look versus the grey, white, and black of the GF crib.What I really enjoyed about the BB crib is how user friendly set up and take down is along with the materials used. I feel like the $60 or so difference in price tag of the BB crib is fair given its more apparent quality. Ultimately, I feel like you can't go wrong with either crib. They both have their pros and cons. If I could, I'd engineer a travel crib that had the sleek, luxe look and quality of the BB crib with the side zipper, carrying case, and folded dimensions of the GF crib. In the long run, I decided to go for the BB crib because I felt like it suited my family's needs more.Happy traveling!

This one will keep you guessing all the way! I'm only wondering one thing though. I admire Joe for feeding Nate's birds but, being a horse person, am wondering who fed his two horses while he and the family temporarily relocated. Perhaps it's just a given that he fed them on the way out to Nate's?
I am now on book 6 of C.J. Box's stories of Joe Pickett, Wyoming Game Warden. Cannot put them down and like pototo chips, I can't read just one! Highly recommend the series!

It was suggested to me that I read books by C.J. Box while I waited for the 5th season (we hope and pray) is being considered and filmed. Well, I'm hooked and am now on book #6!  Great suspenseful reading that leads one from one book to the next.The depiction of state worker game warden Joe Pickett is pretty spot and anyone who is, was, or knows a Wyoming State employee will know what I mean.  But it also describes why the people who live in Wyoming choose to live and work here despite low pay and the usual government bureaucracy.I heartily endorse C.J. Box's stories. I can't put them down and immediately buy the next one to keep the story going.
Bought this to sharpen the blades on my brush hog mower. Clearance is tight under that machine and this was just the right size to get to the blades.
My grandson's birthday party was today. The shirt is just perfect for him. It's not tight but he didn't drown in it either. He loved that his birthday number was on it too!

The Outlander series of books are phenomenal! Start with book one or you will be totally lost. The TV series, season #1 was fabulous. Waiting anxiously for season #2. However, I'm reading the books because they're just fascinating and give a lot more inside details that just can't be included in an hour show. I was dragged kicking and screaming to this series because I ordinarily do not like time travel stories.......well, the first book and I was hooked!

This product seems to have disappeared from my local grocers soooo, I called Krusties and they said to buy it on Amazon.com! How simple was that! Delivered right to my home!  Bought a case of 12 and put 11 of them in the freezer. These are wonderful, easy to make (1 egg and 1 cup of water). Great for emergencies, unexpected company coming, or just a wonderful mid morning snack with the last of the coffee, etc.

The entire Outlander series is stupendous. I'm on book 7 and have bought the first 1/2 season DVD and pre ordered the second half.  This is a fascinating story and for one who had to be dragged kicking and screaming to it, I'm hooked!Make sure you start with book #1 though or you'll be helplessly lost.
A great series to have on DVD! Craig Johnson writes great books and this Longmire series continues on Netflix beginning September 10th. Love both the books and the series.
Anything and everything that Craig Johnson writes is superb! His series, Longmire, continues on Netflix starting September 10th! Great show to go along with his great books!
I love anything written by Bev Pettersen.  This story didn't disappoint me.
This was such a sad story but I doubt that I will ever feel sorry for myself again. Read it and appreciate what you have.
I'm reading each one of the Emma Harte books in sequence. I want to know what happens to each of these characters.
This was a replacement for a broken one. It fit perfectly.

Great consistency! Easy to work with. I cut it to fit the seat on my bay window where my little dog jumps up and sits. He no longer slides and neither does his blanket. I would use it in another color like white for shelving. Good product.

I was profoundly affected by this story of perseverance! Now, when I start to feel sorry for myself, I remember this man and what he survived. The human spirit is a wondrous thing. It was difficult in places to read as one cannot really wrap their mind around the atrocities mankind can inflict on one another but keep reading! It gets easier and you will appreciate life the farther along in the book you get.
Unfortunately, I loved them TOO much and could not stop eating them.

Much has been written about the Kennedy extra marital affairs but this book really pours it on. If this story is correct and accurate, then the Kennedy's are one huge testosterone laced slime ball on steroids!I would have preferred to have each Kennedy mail given his own chapter too as this book jumps around and I found it hard to follow just which Kennedy was boinking who.
Anything written by Robin Carr will be good. This is a fine story about a woman pilot, the prejudice she faces and how she proves herself in the long run.
Bev Pettersen does not write bad books. Just pick anything by her and you will enjoy. This is an adorable short story.

It was ok. Guess because I'm older, the frequent use of the Fword just doesn't sit well with me. This is a story of 3 generations of women and their everyday life events with a couple of surprises thrown in.

My new rescue dog will eat it but prefers the dry cat food that's available to my rescue cats.  I have to mix some canned dog food with the Blue Buffalo in order for him to eat it. He does have the BB available to him free choice but won't eat it.
The product arrived as shown and in a timely fashion. Would buy from FurBuddy again.
Should have asked because grandson already had some of this track. Saving grace was that my gift just added more fun as it just made existing track bigger! Both the 3 and 5 year old love it!
I just love anything written by Suzie. If you've read other stories by her, you know what I mean. If this is your first, you're in for a treat.

I grew up country in Illinois. This was like going home and kickin' around the homestead. I still live rural and can relate to all the stories. Sometimes it's just nice to relive a wonderful childhood.

# One advice....make sure you assemble it on perfectly level ground or pavement.It's much smaller than it looks.The shade cloth assembly is difficult.Guess it would be ok for use at dog shows but the amount of time that it takes to set it up just wasn't worth it to me. Very expensive decision.
Read this before "The Mountain Between Us" or you'll be reading things backwards. I wish I had known. I now has a useless book because I know how everything turns out.
It would have been nice to be informed of the prequel to The Mountain Between Us which is  "The View From Here". I now know what happens because I read "The Mountain Between Us" first.

I didn't know if this was an entire book of the same characters or several short stories.....very confusing to me. Maybe it's just me but I was lost most of the time. I'd be interested to find out if other felt the same way.
I have horses so pretty much know when something isn't realistic. This is a good read. I've since bought more Sara Gruen books.

This book brought to light the struggle, fear, panic, false bravado..... all senses of what being in war is like.....not that anyone who has NOT actually been there can say they know.....but this comes close!
Talk about name dropping boredom! I simply could not get through the entire book. I thought this read would be a little more uplifting and educational but no....
I love animals. I love the romance of the area. All of these books are classics and can be read over and over.
I enjoy women's fiction and am sold on Patricia Mc Linn's style of writing. I've ordered two more trilogy's by here.

This author is very polite about the first ladies of our country. I appreciated that. I also learned some things that I'd never heard such as the need for a complete restructuring of the White House!  Very good read!
This is the perfect combination for making my plumeria bloom like it lives in Hawaii!  Does a great job of getting any blooming plant to exceed expectations!
This has been a long winter and I'm already depressed. This book didn't lift my spirits enough to continue to the end.
Nice story but I prefer my "fluff romance" sex scenes to be a little less graphic with more left to the imagination.

I Just couldn't get through it. Sorry, but it just didn't hold my interest.  It just seemed to ramble on about village bullies, etc. Maybe it got better but I just didn't have the patience to slog any further.

I have several different charging bricks and this is now my favorite one-- it is compact for a 5000mah unit, and I like that it has one cable that serves both to charge it and serves as both an Android USB and an Apple lightning cable. The case is stylish and fits easily into pocket or purse. I received a review unit of this charger in exchange for this review.

This is indeed a beautiful sculpture--- I don't think the pictures do it justice. Heavy gauge metal, beautiful brilliant colors, heavy clear top coat--- it looks like it will last a long time. But "the slightest breeze sets the bouquet of color into motion" is not true at all. Winds of 5-10mph, enough to make my lawn flags ripple and leaves on my trees rustle, have zero effect on this sculpture. Doesn't turn even slightly. And it's not because it's not well balanced, but because it's perfectly flat--- there are no curved vane edges to catch wind and generate rotational energy, and so you have to have strong winds for it to move. It's so beautiful I still love having it in my yard but a kinetic sculpture it isn't.

The Coravin is sturdily built with steel components. It works as advertised--- its needle plunges through the cork, and then you can press a button to put in argon gas and pour out the wine.  Since you're pouring through a needle it takes awhile to fill a glass, but it's a simple process once you get the hang of it. It comes in an attractive black storage box with a magnetic clasp. It would be nice if the storage box had dedicated space to hold spare argon canisters but it does not. I think the ideal use for this would be for someone who has a variety of fine reds and enjoys just one glass in the evening, and may not pour another of that bottle for another week or month. If you mostly pour reds at parties or dinners where you'll use the whole bottle in an evening obviously you don't need the coravin, and if you tend to go for inexpensive blends then the cost of the unit and cartridges are more than the cost of wasted wine from a half used bottle.

The Good:Stylish, 8 hour battery life, water resistant, very loud for size so works well for outdoor spacesThe not so good:It's not a stereo speaker, it has a manual analog volume control which makes volume control with your phone difficult, and the instruction manual is written in 18 languages and is truly horrible.Conclusion: good but not great

The base is actually very heavy and solid, the arm joints are long and there is a hex key that stores in the base that you can manually tighten and untighten the joints if you want to fix the position. The light itself is superb, extremely bright with a wide and even coverage area. In a completely dark room this light can evenly illuminate an entire executive desk top. For the price of the lamp, I would have expected a swivel base and a swivel head to give more flexibility in light position adjustment, and the light intensity adjustment is the "hold and wait for it to cycle up and down" type which is not nearly as convenient as a dedicated up/down button or knob. Overall, though, it's the best quality LED desk lamp I've seen.

The toy is really cute to look at and hold, the volume on the voicebox is actually adult-friendly (it's not too loud so the kid holding the toy can hear him fine but not the whole rest of the room), when you squeeze its tummy hard it causes little "candy" pieces of plastic to float around in his eyes (see the video) which to an adult is underwhelming but kids think it's neat. I could not smell any cotton candy smell. If you have a child that loved Bing Bong in the movie they will love this toy.

I have several Brainwavz headphones and have been pleased with them all. The S5 series has quality components and superior audio. Sound reproduction is accurate over a broad range of musical types. I especially like the variety of tips they include, including higher end comply tips. The flat cabling is a big plus to reduce tangles as well. I own, well, A LOT of phones and the S5 is one of my faves. Good value for the price. I received a free review copy of these phones.

These are cheap bluetooth phones to use when you're walking or running. The phone design itself is very comfortable, adapts to different ear styles, and gives you a secure fit. The audio quality is, well, what you would expect at this price range. Would love to see this particular over ear design coupled with higher quality audio. I received a free pair of these phones for review.

This is obviously a cheap knockoff. It is not compatible with true erector sets. The instructions are unclear and hard to follow. I have built dozens of models over decades with every building system I could get my hands on and this is undoubtedly the cheapest and worst I've ever dealt with--- it's the first model set I've ever actually threw in the trash. I read some of the five star reviews which describe features like "arrives with a pullback motor" which aren't even part of the set and, I'm sorry to say, are obviously fake reviews. Do not waste your time and money on this set.

This is a "soft book" activity toy for infants that opens up to a four square panel printed on both sides. Two panels are the front and back covers. There is a "toot toot" peek a boo panel showing a tiger playing a saxophone, a "tweet tweet" panel with an elephant playing a flute, a bunny playing drums, and then a mirror panel, and then a "shake shake" panel with a pair of maracas, and a "skritch scratch" panel showing a record. There's also an attached sound box which plays the various sounds when squeezed. It's very cute and geared to infant play. Only downside is that some of these type soft toys are fully washable but the sound box prevents you from immersing it in water.

This is one of those simple purchases that melts a little girl's heart-- to play like she's a mommy carrying around her baby-- plus it means you don't have to carry around that baby doll when she is tired of carrying it! Very cute for when they're in that baby doll stage.

Does a great job of aerating wine, had a Venturi and the Tanors is superior. The Venturi got clogged easily and didn't seem to aerate as thoroughly. The Tanors disassembles easily for cleaning. If you've never tried an aerator for your reds you really don't know what you're missing-- makes even cheap wine taste much smoother. Very satisfied.

This is a cute update to a classic game. Gameplay is the same as regular Candy Land, but with Disney Princesses as both the characters you visit along the way and the tokens players use. The tokens are well made (although there are only three to choose from). The four year old is IN LOVE with this game. You will not be disappointed.

Very sturdy and well put together, perfect size for travel, you can grind enough for 2-3 cups of coffee at a time, easy to adjust the grind, if you've never used a manual grinder it does take some time and effort to grind coffee beans but the results are worth it. A great little grinder.

It's a serviceable bluetooth speaker with good sound. But in a very crowded market, what does it have to stand out for its price? The five hour battery life is good but not outstanding. Bass is not particularly impressive. It can't store more than one bluetooth device pairing unlike some other premium speakers. Although the product listing says there are 4 speakers in the unit which leads you to believe that it is stereo, that isn't specifically delineated in the scant product detail, and on the HDMX website you get a 404 page error if you try to bring up an instruction manual. I expected more for the price.

A great pair of toy binoculars for young kids. They are very rugged, have a neck strap, the eye cups are soft rubberized plastic (nice touch). Of course, the optics are cheap plastic and give a distorted image, but it's still clear and young ones don't even notice. And the low price means if they do get lost or broken they're easily replaced.

It's a cute doll and easy for a toddler to understand and play with, by touching the bow, blouse, and skirt they circle through different colors, while Minnie says the colors. So far, so good. But to "lock in" your color selection you press the doll's hand and then Minnie starts crooning a really awful rewording of Cyndi Lauper's "True Colors."  And I mean REALLY AWFUL, the first time you hear it. And guess what, it doesn't sound better the 100th time your toddler plays it either. A little music that didn't butcher a Grammy nominated 1980s ballad would have been so much better.

I didn't think a spray gel would work well, but it looks and sprays like a spray but once in your hair you can comb and shape it like a medium gel. No scent, nongreasy, easy to toss in a gym bag, I am using it regularly now.

Four year old and eight year old LOVED IT!. There's no extrusion tool on the toy but multiple places and ways to mold tiny Star Wars replicas, and the tiny play doh containers fit on the toy like they're riding on it. It's all so darn cute, easy for grownups to join in the fun, and it's sturdy to boot. This could be the greatest toy ever made.

It's very soft and absorbent. It is large enough to fully cover most yoga mats with a little overlap. It is covered with nonskip dots on its back surface that work well. Worth a try to see if it works well for you.

This Pin Art Board is so much fun. I had so much fun with one of these when I was a teenager. So when I saw one I really wanted to get one for my teenagers. Everyone loves making funny things in the pins, fingers and hands and pushing fun shaped toys in it. Its as big as the palm of your hand plus around the edges. This is made of a back acryllic board that is see through and then a black acryllic board filled with the pins. These do not hurt your hands at all. They almost feel good, especially on a hot day.I received this at a discount for my honest and unbiased review.

I really was excited by the quality of these Cosy House Collection Twin Sheet Sets. They come in a really nice plastic case with a tassle that matches  the sheets. I bought the gray twin set and these fit our twin beds perfectly. These is a deep gray color, nice and dark. These have a beautiful embroidered line edge with two thick lines and a thin line in a middle. These are super soft and smooth, almost silky. These came nice and smooth and wrinkle free. I just love how they look on the bed. These are a deep pocket sheet so will fit on even over a mattress topper or a really good mattress. These are very nice, comfortable and well made sheets. I would buy more sets for my house.I received these at a discount for my honest and unbiased review.

Loving these wonderful Polarized Sunglasses made from Duduma. The frames are a super shiny silver color and a smooth design. They have black nose pieces and black soft areas where they hit your ear to keep them rubbing. They have really clear good polarized lenses. The sunglasses come with a nice carrying bag and a cleaning cloth for your lenses. You can store both the glasses and the cleaning cloth in the carrying bag. They are very comfortable and easy to wear. My husband loves them for fishing, because they make the fish so easy to see. These are prefect sunglasses to store in your fishing kit.I received these free for my honest and unbiased review.

These are just too fun for your Disney Jr Doc McStuffins loving kids. I have an almost 2 and almost 3 year old and they adore Doc McStuffins. They were so excited when these cups came in the mail. You get a two pack of Sippy cups. They say they are spill proof but once dropped (or thrown) they do spill some. You get one pink cup and one purple cup. While these are geared more towards girls, my boys didn't care about the colors at all. They just love Doc McStuffins. They each have a twist off lid and a silicone stopper to make them not leak. These are a good 10oz size so perfect for toddlers. They are easy to wash as the silicone stopper comes out for easy washing. They are also dishwasher safe.I received these at a discount for my honest and unbiased review.

My daughter just loves Shopkins and so I have started watching for them for her for the Holidays. This is a three pack set. It comes in a cute little green reusable grocery bag that fits the set and the book in it. It has a purple grocery cart with fruit in it. It also comes with a activity book that is filled with stickers, activities, color pages and a collectors list. This has four huge pages of stickers that are just adorable. I secretly wanted to take a few.  The book is also thick and well made, not a cheap paper one. Lastly it comes with a Shopkins 12 pack. It comes with 2 hidden Shopkins and a Polished Pearl Shopkin. There is also four little green Shopkins bags, and a pink grocery basket. This set also comes with a collectors guide. I just love all the adorable faces on the Shopkins. They are just so  much fun. Even as an adult I want to collect them! My daughter flips everytime I buy her new one's!I received these at a discount for my honest and unbiased review.

This is a super heavy duty well made glass baking dish. It has a pretty etching on the handles. My husband is a chef and loves to cook and loves to get new kitchen gadgets. He was very impressed with our new baking dish. It's a very thick shatterproof glass and super heavy duty. This could be used in a commercial kitchen just as well as in a kitchen at home. The glass is super thick. We have tried using ours for chicken, and desserts. It works well for anything that I have tried. Best of all I don't have to worry about it slipping and breaking. I am super clumsy so this is a real concern in our house. I have broken so many dishes. This dish is just so well made. It's safe for most uses and almost can not be broken. I really appreciate how well made it is.I received this at a discount for my honest and unbiased review.

This TENS unit is almost identical to another one I got in July. I have been wanting to get another for gifts for awhile now and so when I realized it was almost the same unit.  It's a great size, perfect for travel or even keeping in your rv or your car. It is about the size of a universal remote control. Batteries are included which is a plus. It comes packaged in a box, nothing rolling around. It includes the remote, wires, pulse pads, batteries, and instructions. I suggest discussing the best use with your physical therapist or pain specialist on the best way to use a Tens Machine for yourself and how long and what strength.To use: Clean the area you will be using it on, then dry. Attach the wires to the remote. One at a time (so they don't stick to something else and get dirty) attach the pulse pads to the area that is bothering you. Do this for both sides. Make sure they are well attached, because if they fall off, your gonna get a shock trying to get them back in place. Once they are firmly in place turn on each side's dial to the LOWEST setting. Move this up slowly one side at a time till you are getting a comfortable amount of pressure. Do not turn it up too high. (Again contact your doctor if you need too) This set like the similar one I use has numerous settings, levels and areas. You should try them out until you see what works for you because it is different for everyone. This TENS machine has an automatic shut off at 15 minutes. As an advanced user that kind of annoys me but this is a good thing for beginners.The LCD Screen has a picture of a human body to show you the area for your session. It also shows you how many minutes are left in your session. If you need to start a new session you must turn the dials off, and the turn them back on. The button settings include Waist, Shoulder, Joint, Hand-Leg, Repeat and Sole. There is a Speed setting so you can make it go faster or slower. Then there is settings for Massage, Beat and Knead. You really need to play with these to see what helps your pain. This is pretty much identical to my last Tens Unit.When your done with your session you should ALWAYS carefully remove the pulse pads and place back on the sheet they came on. If you take care to only put them on clean skin and return to their sheet, they will last you quite awhile. Just like my previous one this is an excellent TENS machine. I have been very pleased with this model. It works just as good for me as the one my doctor puts me on when I go in to their office.I received this at a discount for my honest and unbiased review.

This is such a cute drum set for your young aspiring musician! At first when you open the box, you may think that all the pieces are not there. The drums were safely nestled inside one another for easy packing, and there was cardboard to protect the delicate drums. Then you have your stool pieces, and your cymbals holder and your drumsticks. Also included is a foot pedal to have your little one bang on the big drum at the bottom! The directions were a bit tricky at first but in fact putting it together was quite simple. Your big drum sits at the bottom, you have feet that hold it up. Then your other drums (4) slide into the plastic holders you attach to the big drum. Everything attaches there. Two larger drums slide into the attachments on either side, and the 2 mini drums attach at the top to another plastic piece you insert on the top of the large drum. On the same top setup you slide on your cymbals and there are caps to put on to hold them. The drumsticks are simple plastic drumsticks.I know many people are afraid to buy a drum set for their child simply because of the noise. You'll be happy to know that this particular set is not overly loud. Its a great starter set for a younger 3-5 year old child, and with gentle handling it can last through some fun beats! The stool is a nice thick plastic stool easily put together by sliding legs together and attaching the top. You will not need any screwdriver or hammer to put this together, just a little patience and about 20 minutes!I received this product free in exchange for my honest and unbiased review

I have a toddler how simply has to have a straw with his juice, and I found myself wishing for washable straws instead of buying a bag of them every other day. Now that I have these glass straws, both of us are happy. These are very durable and dishwasher safe if you put them on the top rack. My son gets a kick out of watching his juice come up. They also tickle the fancy of us adults in the house.I hadn't thought about the impact on the environment that plastic straws until I saw how many I alone was throwing out. With these, I no longer throw out straws, I simply wash them. I love that they come in a case to store them, so there is less clutter in my drawers. I'm definitely going to tell my friends about these. I am very pleased with them.I received these free for my honest and unbiased review.

We have a large family,so when we make pasta I have to drain it in portions. Now that I have this giant colander that problem is a thing of the past. It has plenty of room with holes throughout, there is no band around the base. This gives proper drainage without leaving hot water on my noodles. I also use it to clean my lettuce and other vegetables. With good sized handles,putting the pasta on a serving dish is easy . Now I don't worry about uneven cooked linguine or other noodles. I am most pleased with this colander, it is a welcome addition to my kitchen tools. This is a cola nerd that I can recommend.I received this product free for my honest and unbiased review.

Ok this is just too much fun. I love little fun items like this for my desk area where I work. This is actually really useful as it can hold batteries and business cards, and little random things that happen to be lying around the are. I adore that everything on this miniature shopping cart really works from the kids seat to the rolling wheels. It is a miniature shopping cart in all aspects. It looks just like a big one at the store. My kids just loved it but I was not giving it up. It would be perfect for barbies though I have to admit.It would make a great Christmas gift or anytime gift for pretty much anyone you know. I collect miniatures so it was perfect for me!I received this at a discount for my honest and unbiased review.

This is a very nice art easel for a table display or painting. My husband draws and paints and his art easel got left when we moved so I have been trying to get him a new one. I am so glad we got this one because it's not too huge and so can be easily stored when not in use. It's nice wood and chain and really sturdy. I will hold a small canvas up to a 12 inch canvas. It also can just be used with your done canvas as a lovely display in your home. It seems to be made very well and I am impressed with the construction of it. I would love to get some other sizes for my kids and displays around the house.I received this free for my honest and unbiased review.

These are just so awesome, and they are super huge. This set includes three different berry scents. The bath bombs are so big that you can actually break them up into many smaller parts for multiple baths. These come in a nice fun super hero looking pink box that is tied with a pink bow and product information.  I got Strawberry Pavlova, Tutti Fruiti and Very Berry and I love all of them. My daughter and I have been enjoying a fun treat in our otherwise boring baths. I love the fizzing they make, and the scent makes you rest and relax. I will be buying more!I received this at a discount for my honest and unbiased review!

This little purse is very sleek, and goes with almost all of my dresses. I love that I can take it to formal functions or out on the town. It holds my essentials and still has room for my phone. The credit card pocket is perfect for keeping my cards in one place and not scattered about my purse. It comes with a detachable chain so I can go from a clutch to shoulder strap within seconds.The beads and sequins are stunning,they remind me of my grandmothers cute little clutch. This add the right amount of elegance to my wardrobe. It is fast becoming my favorite purse, for any function that I attend. My friends all think that it is adorable, which I'm taking as a hint for birthday presents. My daughter wants to use it for homecoming and prom.I received this product free for my honest and unbiased review.

Who doesn't love fresh pie right out of the oven? We have it at least once a week at our house, in doing so I need a good pie plate. This one is exactly what I need as it is very durable and I have kids that are a wee bit accident prone. It is shatterproof, I found that out because my son dropped it once and it didn't even chip. This plate is a bit deeper than others that I have, which means more pie! And I love the fluted rim, it makes my crust look beautiful.I am very pleased with this plate, it has come in handy when I bake. If you bake be it professionally or just at home, I recommend this pie plate because of its high quality. It looks great sitting on my table filled with pie, like a picture in a cooking magazine. This is my favorite pie dish, it has replaced my other one. I'm looking forward to using other products from this company.I received this product free for my honest and unbiased review.

I seriously can not tell you how awesome this is. It's super easy to pair with any device. I have used my iPad, my phone, and my kids phones to use it. I love that I can plug it into a lamp and just leave it there as a light. The light itself is very low, so really not good for like a normal light bulb in a room, hence the lamp. Also I can move the lamp around without having to keep taking the bulb out. I however after scanning the QR code with my iPad 2 could not get the app to work. So I honestly have no idea how the colors work. I was sad about that, but honestly even without it this speaker bulb is so awesome.The quality of sound is really good and comparable to my better Bluetooth speakers. My husband loves to use this while he is cleaning. It's easy to use, and adjust the volume from the iPad. It's just awesome and sturdy. I was worried since it's a "light bulb" but no it's great. It also comes in a hard plastic case that it can be stored in when not in use so It can not be broken. I can honestly say since we bought it every teenager we know has begged me to get them one.I received this at a discount for my honest and unbiased review.

I love old fashioned everything, but especially bathing suits. They are so much more flattering for women who are not scrawny and have hips or bellies from age or babies. This high waist bathing suit is so flattering. I have a baby belly and larger hips and I just loved how it looked on me. I was worried I would look bad, but it's super flattering. The bottoms are high waist and ruched up the front sides. This is super slimming and flattering to your figure. The bathing suit top is like a bikini top, but with more full coverage, it's also super soft and again figure flattering. It hides rolls and gives you nice cleavage but not over done like if you were 18. It ties in the back and around the neck.This suit is a navy blue color with red polka dots. It's very vintage and retro looking. It reminds me of suits on our grandparents generation. Clothing was so flattering back then for curvy women. I found that this ran slightly big on me. I am 5'2, a size 10/12. I have a 36C chest. I ordered the XL and the top fits perfectly but the bottoms are slightly loose. Honestly I don't even care because when it's on it looks so nice and fits so comfortably. I adore how pretty and figure flattering it is.I received this free for my honest and unbiased review.

Since my three year old got his hand on our last advent wreath, we've needed a new one. This one is a perfect color to match our tradition of Silver and Aqua even with the traditional advent candles. It is a 12" wreath with four candle holders, one for each week leading up to Christmas. The bows and pine cones give the whole thing a festive feeling for the season. This wreath is very well built, and very hopeful it will survive our toddler. All of the baubles are on securely bring a simple yet elegant touch to the wreath. This one is meant for the hall, but it can go wherever you find a perfect spot for. For those who believe, and those who don't, this makes a great decoration for holidays to come.I received this product free for my honest and unbiased review.

My boys love to play in their kitchen when I cook dinner. And the love to play hide and seek, so I thought what a great way to combine the two would these eggs be. The boys absolutely loved this idea. The eggs themselves are made out of a durable plastic. So when my toddler tosses them at his brothers, they don't break.These are also great for decorating around the house. They are a natural tan color and look like real eggs. I used some of them to make a wreath and some cute little ornaments. There are plenty in the sack for both crafts and playing. I recommend these for kids and adults alike.I received this product free for my honest and unbiased review.

This firetruck is loads of fun and what kid does not like firetrucks? Sadly I do not see it lasting long, because of how its built. It has all the cool gadgets and whistles, ladders, and water sprayer guns and flashing lights. Our siren did not work at all which makes me sad. The flashing lights were my kids favorite parts. The truck moves back and forth but does get stuck fairly easy. It has rubber wheels, but most of it is plastic.The best part is that it comes with rechargeable batteries and so can be charged and used over and over. The cord plugs into the bottom of the firetruck from the charger. It's about 2 foot long so has to sit and charge. You can not play with it as it is charging. Overall this is a fun toy and my younger kids love it.I received this free for my honest and unbiased review.

My family just adores this shampoo for babies and little ones. The smell is so great, almost good enough to eat. It makes fun bubbles when poured under the flowing water in the tub. All kids love a bubble bath, and I love one that smells so good. It's also a body wash and a shampoo. I normally am leary of items that are shampoo and body wash but this is excellent. It works very well on both my one and two year old's hair. My one year old has thin, wispy hair, and my two year old has super thick curly hair. This Shampoo worked equally well on both hair types. Using it as body wash has added a good amount of moisture, especially to the one year old who has terribly dry and sensitive skin. First published in 1940, SHADOW OF THE SWASTIKA is a transcript of a six-part radio drama series, originally broadcast on the BBC Home Service between November 1939 and January 1940, charting Hitler's rise to power and subsequent expansionist foreign policy during the Thirties as he sought Lebensraum, or living space, for his chosen German people.The style is what might be described as agit-prop in tone, comprising a series of dialogues between politicians, diplomats, and ordinary members of the population, either commenting on or implementing Hitler's policies.  Hitler himself appears as a driven man, continually making promies - and taking others in as he does so - and subsequently breaking them.  Aided and abetted by faithful lieutenants including Göring as Minister of Propaganda, he not only wins over German hearts and minds, even though he seldom if ever obtained a parliamentary majority, but intimidates the leaders of neighboring countries to submit to his will.  Hence his annexation of Austria was achieved at comparatively little human cost.On the other hand Lloyd and Vinogradoff's script portrays the Führer as somewhat paranoid, perpetually apprehensive of being toppled by his enemies.  Hence his predeliction for wanting to crush them at all costs, even if they have not done anything wrong.  The so-called "Knight of the Long Knives" of 1934, when he had his one-time faithful ally Röhm murdered in cold blood is a good example of this.As befits one of the co-authors (Lloyd was a lifetime advocate of folk culture), SHADOW OF THE SWASTIKA gives plenty of voice to ordinary people whose voices matter yet remain startlingly irrelevant to Hitler's overall purpose.  So long as they keep quiet and accept his racist policies without question, then they will not be harmed.  But SHADOW OF THE SWASTIKA shows that their voices do matter, for it is only by listening to ordinary people that the horrific consequences of Nazism come to light.  One sequence where a father criticizes Nazi policies and then worries about whether his son (an active member of the Hitler Youth movement) has overheard, and might report him to the authorities for sedition, is especially chilling.The dramatic style might seem strident, even naive to modern readers; but we have to remember that SHADOW OF THE SWASTIKA is an immediate response to contemporary events broadcast in the first months of the Second World War.  It was obviously designed to apprise listeners of Nazism's true threat to the future of free speech and democratic values and thereby inspire a greater determination to resist, whatever the consequences.  The plays more than admirably fulfilled that task.

I will not summarize the plot of THE LAST KINGDOM, as it follows a familiar quest-pattern and has been amply described by previous reviewers. Suffice to say that the source-text's author is Bernard Cornwell, an established writer of historical adventures set in various historical periods that have translated successfully to television in the past (remember SHARPE (1993-2008))?Directed by four different people (Anthony Byrne, Ben Chanan, Peter Hoar and Nick Murphy), THE LAST KINGDOM is basically SHARPE transposed to the Saxon/ Viking era, with the same combination of familial politics, intrigue and rivalry.
